Leo’s family recipe of a traditional Sicilian dish made of eggplants, onions, Castelvetrano green olives, celery, carols, extra virgin olive oil and served with bruschetta bread

top

Caesar Salad $15.00

siciliana $16.50

DOP, boiled potatoes, hard boiled eggs, loasted

Pasta

sauce

pepper

Bedda Mia homemade tomato sauce with

ravioli del doge $ 26.50
Homemade short ribs ravioli, light butter fresh

An ancient Sicilian pesto recipe made from
basil, tomatoes, almond flour, pecorino cheese,
pine nuts, garlic, extra virgin olive oil and
parmigiano reggiano. This dish is served with
sliced almonds on top

cacio e pepe $18.50
A classic from the city of Rome, this pasta dish
is served with pecorino cheese, black pepper,
butter and heavy cream

Bedda Mia delicious Bolognese ragù,
besciamella sauce and parmigiano reggiano

risotto ai funghi $26.00

mushrooms creamy sauce, garlic, parsley,
sfumato with white wine
RISOTTO AI FRUTTI DI MARE 28.00

Trofie, a typical Genovese pasta served with
Alessio’s fumily pesto recipe with diced potatoes
and green beans
spaghetti alla carbonara $23.50
Probably the most famous pasta dish in Rome,
made with eggs, pecorino cheese, guanciale,

spaghetti alla amatriciana $23.50

pepper and pecorino Romano

Bedda Mia fresh homemade tomato sauce for

PICCATA DI POLLO AL LIMONE O AL

mussels, silmon, calamar, tilapia, prawns,

We are proud to be one of the tastiest
local seafood restaurants
in Santa Cruz. Our restaurant menu offers a variety of options sure to please everyone.
*Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish or eggs may increase your risk of food-borne illness.
Skirt Steak
Tender steak topped with herb garlic butter or bleu cheese butter. Served with mashed potatoes and broccoli.
dinner only
Fish & Chips
Beer battered fresh red snapper, fries, homemade coleslaw and your choice of tartar or cocktail sauce. (Shrimp and Chips | Add $3.00)
dinner | lunch
Calamari Steak Almondine
Lightly breaded, grilled and topped with lemon butter sauce and almonds. Served with rice pilaf and asparagus.
dinner only
New York Steak
12oz. Angus choice topped with herb butter. Served with rosemary potatoes and asparagus.
dinner | lunch
Seasoned Sirloin Steak
An 8oz. seasoned steak topped with sweet grilled onions and mushrooms with a side of mashed potatoes and asparagus.
dinner | lunch
Grilled Wild Salmon
Topped with hollandaise sauce. Served with Israeli couscous and asparagus.
dinner only
Seafood Pasta
Salmon, prawns and mushrooms over a bed of fettuccine with your choice of alfredo, marinara or pesto sauce.
dinner only
Famous Mac N' Cheese

name: Chocolate
raw_text:
Menu – Chocolate Santa Cruz
Restaurant and Bar
Dinner Nightly 5pm-9pm
RESERVE A TABLE
Lunch Noon-4pm Fridays, Saturdays, Sundays
Cocktails
Bourbon Bee
Westside Water is a locally-distilled small-batch bourbon. Served with fresh lemon juice, California honey, and a splash of ginger juice over ice.
Chocolate Martini
Our vodka is infused for a minimum of two weeks with Mutari cacao nibs. We add a few drops of vanilla syrup, and the magic is all for you!
Chocolate Mezcal Martini
Family-owned Banhez Mezcal is made the traditional way. the more we learn about this distillery, the more we like it.
Chocolate-Raspberry Rum
We infuse our locally-blended gold rum with organic raspberries, and Mutari cacao nibs. Served quite chilled with a splash of vanilla syrup and organic raspberries
Espresso Martini
We infuse organic espresso beans from Alta Coffee Roasters in our locally-made vodka for at least two months, and then add a mini-splash of vanilla syrup to make this a well-balanced cocktail. You choose it with or without a splash of cream.
Mai Tai
So popular in the 1970s among beachcombers, the Mai Tai is a bomb boasting 4 ounces of alcohol. Golden rum, curacao, and a splash of passion fruit juice are topped off with a shot of dark rum to make this drink unforgettable.
Passion Fruit Margarita
Fresh squeezed lime juice, Arette Blanco tequila, passion fruit juice, and a squirt of agave syrup make this our most popular cocktail.
Pineapple-Chipotle Margarita
We infuse our tequila with these flavorful smoky chipotles for over a month. Adding caramelized pineapple makes this fresh-lime margarita balanced and flavorful.
Appetizers/Small Plates
Antipasto Platter
A sampler platter of pestos, cheeses and roasted &pickled vegetables. Fun to share. Served with our house-made focaccia. (can be made GF by upgrading to GF mini-loaf, or omitting bread)
Artichoke & Cheese Pot
A sizzling pot of melted Asiago and ricotta cheeses, with sliced artichoke hearts and a splash of white wine. Served with Baguette from “Adorable French Bakery”
Brussels Sprouts
Organic Brussels sprouts from Rodoni farms. Roasted with Tellicherry black pepper and smoked sea salt. Served with sesame dipping sauce. (GF)
Gluten-Free Mini Loaf
Light, and yet rich and delicious, this fragrant mini-loaf was developed for us by the folks at Red House Bakery, and now we make it here for you. Served with butter.
Marinara and Pesto Pot
Served with our house-made focaccia, for dipping.
Portobello Mushroom Dripping with Gorgonzola
A roasted portobello mushroom sitting on a wedge of flaky butter pastry, and topped with melted gorgonzola cheese. Drizzled with balsamic reduction and sprayed with white truffle-olive oil. Can you say no?
Roast Chicken Skillet Appetizer
Mary’s free-range chicken breast smothered in our house-made barbecue sauce. Served in an iron skillet with our house-made focaccia.
Salads and Soups
Caesar Salad
Chopped organic romaine lettuce, tossed in our vegetarian caesar dressing. Topped with toasted walnuts and pecorino Romano.
Chicken Soup
Mary’s chicken with organic vegetables and potatoes. Served with organic sourdough bread from Companion Bakery.
Greek Salad
Organic romaine lettuce, house-marinated organic cucumbers, kalamata olives, feta, organic tomatoes, pickled red onion and our lemon-XV olive oil dressing.
House Salad
Organic baby greens, tomatoes and house-pickled cucumbers. with our balsamic vinaigrette.
Mediterranean Salad
Sun-dried tomatoes, artichoke hearts, kalamata olives, Romano cheese, and roasted pistachios. With our lemon dressing on the side.
Shiitake Soup
Organic shiitake mushrooms, spinach and onions make up this miso-based, vegan soup. Served with organic sourdough bread from Companion Bakery.
Spinach Mushroom Salad
Organic baby spinach, topped with Roasted Portobello Mushroom, Romano cheese, and white truffle oil. Served with balsamic vinaigrette.
Main Courses
Chicken Parmesan
Roasted Mary’s boneless chicken breast, with organic marinara, fior di latte, and pecorino Romano. Sizzling golden.
Chicken Pie
Light, flaky crust; no soupy filling. Mary’s free-range Chicken with organic potatoes and vegetables. Our chicken gravy on the side. (not “pot pie”).
Eggplant Parmesan
Organic eggplant from Live Earth Farms, roasted and then layered with organic marinara sauce, provolone and pecorino romano cheeses.  (gf) (v)
Hand-Rolled Fettuccine
A generous portion of hand-rolled fettuccine topped with Romano cheese, Served with your choice of our house-made sauce.: Organic Marinara, Bolognese (pork), or Classic Pesto.
Mo’le Plate
Traditional Mexican dish. Choice of Rich Oaxaqueño, Spicy Poblano, or rich and spicy Amarillo made with cumin and saffron. Made with Mary’s free-range boneless chicken breast. Sub jumbo shrimp for $3 extra.
Mo’le Trio
Mo’le is a traditional Mexican dish. Mo’le “Trio”, Served in a 3 compartment cast iron tray with all 3 sauces. Rich Oaxaqueño, Spicy-Chocolaty Poblano & our complex and spicy Amarillo sauce. Made with Mary’s free-range boneless chicken breast. Sub jumbo shrimp available for $3.
Pasta Rosettes
Hand-rolled pasta, stuffed with ricotta and Romano Cheeses. Served with your choice of our house-made sauce.: Organic Marinara, Artichoke Cream, Bolognese (pork), or Classic Pesto.
Polenta Plate
Baked here with corn, onions, eggs, asiago, provolone and Romano cheese(V) (GF)
Sesame-Ginger Salmon
A slab of Canadian King Salmon, roasted until golden. Topped with a slightly sweet, very gingery glaze, candied ginger and sesame seeds.
Spicy Chocolate BBQ Pork
Our roast free-range pork, slow roasted and simmered in our own dark chocolate barbecue sauce. Slightly spicy.
Vegan Mo’le
Roasted organic seasonal vegetable, smothered in our spicy Amarillo Mo’le sauce.(vg) (gf) (nuts).
Desserts
Big Warm Cupcake (gf)
Chocolate cupcake served warm and drenched in bittersweet chocolate ganache. Decorated with rich whipped cream. (gf)
Canoli
A crispy pastry tube, filled with sweetened ricotta, our house-candied oranges, and bittersweet chocolate bits. Our home-spun version of the Sicilian classic!
Cherry Chocolate Mousse Cake
Organic cherries, dark chocolate cake and rich chocolate mousse, covered in bittersweet ganache. (gf)
Chocolate Cream Pie
Rich custard filling made with Columbian bittersweet chocolate. Our crust is made with grated almonds and chocolate. (gf)
Chocolate Ecstasy Sundae
A scoop of our Darkest Chocolate gelato sitting in a pool of bittersweet ganache. Topped with a slice of our dark chocolate Ecstasy cake, and rich whipped cream. (gf)
Coconut Cheesecake
Made with fresh cream, and coconut milk in our {gf) almond flour crust. Topped with dark chocolate and shredded coconut.
Coconut Cream Pie
Classic coconut custard filling in our almond (gf) crust.
Dessert Orgy
A sampler platter of sweets to share.
Dulce de Leche Torte
Triple-layer dark chocolate cake with two layers of rich, caramelized Valrhona white chocolate cream and a touch of rum. It’s like a light caramel chantilly. A very special dessert!
Ecstasy Cake
Strong, dark chocolate cake, served with a side of whipped cream. For vegans, no whip makes it a vegan dessert!  (GF)
Gelato
Rich, dense, Italian-style gelato. A little less sweet, and lots more flavor! Darkest Chocolate, Mint Chip, True Vanilla, Espresso,  Coconut-Almond-Crunch, Salted Caramel
Hot Fudge Sundae
True vanilla gelato, sitting in a pool of ganache. Topped with rich whipped cream and more ganache. Served with a lady finger.
Sin Cake
Our flourless Sin Cake is made with ground organic almonds from Anderson Ranch. Drizzled with dark chocolate ganache. Served warm with a dollop of whipped cream. Or try it ala mode! (Available for dine-in only) (GF)
The Titanic
Espresso gelato sinking in a sea of espresso. (for here only, no to-go) (gf)
Tiramisu
Served cake-style; using ladyfingers, mascarpone, espresso, and a touch of rum. Topped with lots of chocolate, and sitting in a pool of espresso syrup.
Vanilla-Passion-Fruit Cheesecake
White chocolate-vanilla cheesecake glazed with passion fruit curd. This cheesecake is smooth and just sweet enough to enjoy the vanilla flavor. The crust is made with grated almonds. (gf)
Truffles (gf)
Bittersweet Truffle
Dark chocolate shell filled with dark chocolate mousse and rolled in cocoa.
Coconut Truffle
Coconut white chocolate mousse, covered in dark chocolate and topped with shredded coconut.
Dark Rose Truffle
Dark chocolate-rose mousse, in a dark chocolate shell.
Dozen Truffles
Fresh Mint Truffle
White chocolate mint mousse, made with fresh mint leaves. In a dark chocolate-mint shell.
Hazelnut Truffle
Hazelnut milk chocolate mousse, in a hazelnut milk chocolate shell. Topped with chopped hazelnuts.
Mocha Truffle
Milk chocolate coffee mousse, in a milk chocolate shell.
White Rose Truffle
White chocolate rose-flavored mousse, covered in white chocolate.
Hot Chocolates
Belga
Extremely rich & flavorful hazelnut chocolate from Belgium.
Bianca
Fragrant, top quality white chocolate. Rich, thick and sweet.
Coca
Rich, dark hot cocoa made with fragrant coconut milk.
Frida
Classic Mexican dark cocoa with cinnamon.
Fuego
Hot ‘n’ spicy dark cocoa, organic cinnamon, and chipotle.
Lena
Very creamy and smooth milk chocolate. Great for kids
Pantoufle
Named for the invisible pet kangaroo in the movie Chocolat, Dark chocolate, milk chocolate and cardamon make this drink fragrant and complex.
Sofia
Strong, full bodied, dark Italian hot cocoa for chocolate lovers
Tres Chiles
Dark chocolate, milk chocolate and cacao, join with mild anchio, guajillo and chipotle chiles and a dash of smoked salt to make this one of our most complex hot chocolates. Only slightly spicy.
Vianne
Named for the Chocolatier in the movie Chocolate, this one is made with dark cocoa, ginger juice, honey & cardamon.
Victoria
Columbian 70% bittersweet chocolate with extra cacao to make this drink a full-bodied chocolate experience.
Zenu
Extra-strong Colombian chocolate. Rich, & fragrant. Made with water.
Catering and Special Services
Please email us at
shop@chocolatesantacruz.com
to arrange details for weddings, rehearsal dinners, and other special events. We also offer cocktail catering bar service, wedding cakes, and wedding planning services.

About the Business
Business owner information
Braddah Timmy H.
Business Owner
We specialize in Hawaiian style plate lunch. Island recipes, and aloha straight from the aloha state of Hawai'i. Local Maui boy Braddah Timmy brings his own 'Ohana's (family) recipes along with over 20 plus years of experience in restaurant and hospitality to bring you the best Hawaiian style food you can find on the mainland! What is Plate Lunch? It is the product many cultures cuisines blended together over the span of a hundred fifty plus years of Hawaiian history during the plantation era. Different cultures came together to work in the sugar cane fields and with them they brought their countries cuisine. Eventually food carts and mom and pop shops would emerge to serve mixed plate blending each countries foods together known today as plate lunch. We hope you enjoy our Ohana's recipes and the aloha we serve in every bite.  Mahalo nui loa,
-Braddah Timmy
Founder and Maui boy

SERVICE CHARGE MAY BE ADDED TO PARTIES OF 6 OR MORE. WE ONLY PRESENT ONE CHECK PER TABLE. THANKS.
FOOD ALLERGY CONCERNS?
DESPITE TAKING EVERY PRECAUTION, WE CANNOT GUARANTEE THAT OUR MENU ITEMS ARE FREE OF TRACE AMOUNTS OF NUTS, TREE NUTS, WHEAT, DAIRY, EGGS, SOY, FISH, SHELLFISH, OR OTHER ALLERGENS.
*ITEMS ARE SERVED RAW OR UNDERCOOKED OR CONTAIN RAW OR UNDERCOOKED INGREDIENTS
*NOTICE: CONSUMING RAW OR UNDERCOOKED MEATS, POULTY, SEAFOOD, SHELLFISH OR EGGS MAY INCREASE YOUR RISK OF FOODBORNE ILLNESS ESPECIALLY IF YOU HAVE CERTAIN MEDICAL CONDITIONS
Visit Us
221 Cathcart St. Santa Cruz, CA. 95060
Phone
(831)426-4852 (HULA)
F.A.Q.
WHAT IS THE FOOD LIKE?
We serve a variety of island inspired fusion dishes with a little Hawaiian flare! The owners have traveled all over the globe in search of the flavors that inspire our great tasting food, and unique menu. We source local products whenever possible. Our knowledgeable staff is well versed on all our menu offerings and can answer any questions you may have. Please don't hesitate to ask!
I HAVE FOOD ALLERGIES. CAN HULA'S ACCOMMODATE ME?
Yes! While we cannot provide an absolute guarantee when it comes to allergies, we will always do our best to accommodate our guests’ dietary needs. We also offer gluten-free and vegetarian/vegan menus.
DO YOU ACCEPT RESERVATIONS?
reservation policies are location specific. Please call the location you are interested in for specific reservation information.
Hula’s is a great place to celebrate with large groups. If you are interested in information on hosting a private event with us please call us or refer to our menus page for additional information.
CAN I CALL AND PUT MY NAME ON THE WAIT LIST BEFORE I GET THERE?
Please call the Hula’s location you are interested in as our waitlist policies are location specific.
DOES HULA'S OFFER FOOD TO GO?
Yes! We happily accept takeout orders in person and over the phone at both our Monterey and Santa Cruz locations.
DOES HULA'S DELIVER?
Unfortunately, Hula’s does not offer delivery at this time.
DOES HULA'S HAVE PARKING?
Yes! Both our Santa Cruz and Monterey locations have a variety of parking options available close by.
ABOUT
PRESS
MONTEREY RESTAURANT
622 Lighthouse Ave. Monterey, CA.93940
Tel: (831)655-4852 (HULA)
SANTA CRUZ RESTAURANT
221 Cathcart St. Santa Cruz, CA.
95060
Tel: (831)426-4852 (HULA)

Tap Takeovers
Feast Your Eyes!
From the sauces to the seasonings to the choice of meats we smoke, Mission St BBQ gives people the occasion and the setting to turn a meal into a memory.
Order Online
All Menu Items Will Sell Out!
We draw inspiration from a variety of tradition-rich regions, from California to the Carolinas, to create our own unique, delicious style of BBQ. We start with the finest quality meats, season them with our time tested rubs, and smoke them with California oak wood to achieve the perfect harmony of smoke and flavor.

About the Business
The AAA Four Diamond, award-winning Chaminade Resort & Spa is a spectacular 300 acre mountaintop hotel in Santa Cruz, California. This historic Mission-style California resort overlooks sweeping views of Monterey Bay National Marine Sanctuary and the Mountains. Chaminade is a luxurious Santa Cruz hotel for celebrations, getaways, weddings and executive meetings.
…

About the Business
Business owner information
Marin A.
Business Owner
Awarding-winning, entertaining, unpretentious, boutique, and family-operated come together at MJA. We are a small winery that pours high-end wines in a relaxed and approachable Hawaiian-inspired atmosphere. When you walk in the door, you are 'Ohana! We offer tastings outdoors on our covered patio and courtyard, at our indoor bar, and in our spacious Barrel Room. We welcome walk-ins for groups of 5 or fewer, and we encourage reservations for groups of 6 or more. Aloha!

rESERVE nOW!

CA. 95010

MENU
BEER WINE & COCKTAILS
RESERVATIONS
GALLERY
CONTACT
​
​
seasonal food &
SPECIALTY CRAFT COCKTAILS
who we are
East end gastropub is a charming mix, combining comfort food with a fine dining finish in a modern and inviting space. It brings together a bit of  bistro to craft cocktail ease. Enjoy house-made pizza dough, fresh pasta and our seasonal salad loaded with local produce and our coveted peanut brittle.
When possible, we work with local fisherman to procure  sustainability caught seafood and local farmers to showcase what the central valley grows in abundance!
See Our Menu >

About Us
Situated just blocks from beautiful Capitola Village and beach, Gayle’s Bakery & Rosticceria offers something for everyone—whether you’re vegan, vegetarian or someone who can’t resist a good Porchetta Sandwich. Everyday you can find freshly baked, buttery pastries, luscious desserts and crusty European breads in the Bakery.

raw_text:
Santa Cruz Menu - Surf City Sandwich | Craft Sandwiches
MENU
MENU

Menu

Santa Cruz Menu
Catering
Surf City Lounge
Order Online
Gilbert AZ
Santa Cruz CA
SANTA CRUZ MENU
Hot Sandwiches
ALL SANDWICHES SERVED W/ HOUSE-MADE CHIPS OR FRESH TOSSED SALAD
Please Call shop for weekly rotating specials
SURF CITY PHILLY
Angus steak, grilled peppers and onions, American cheese, ghost-pepper jack and chipotle mayo on a toasted sweet French roll
CLASSIC HOT PASTRAMI
Angus smoked brisket, melted swiss cheese, pickled jalapeño-Dijon aioli, on thick-cut marble rye
CHICKEN COWABUNGA
Country fried chicken breast, American cheese, kosher pickles, caramelized onions, & Sriracha mayo, brioche bun
Vulcan Mind Melt
Angus beef, Applewood smoked bacon, bbq mayo, ghost pepper jack, sharp cheddar, fried onion rings on a garlic-toasted ciabatta roll
BAJA SHRIMP BACON WRAP
Crispy fried gulf shrimp, applewood smoked bacon, ghost-pepper jack, lettuce, tomato, chipotle mayo, tomato-basil tortilla
NONI'S PESTO CHICKEN
Grilled chicken breast, melted provolone, oven-roasted tomatoes, mayo and pesto on garlic toasted ciabatta roll
SURF CITY BURGER
Angus beef patty, choice of: American , swiss, cheddar or jack cheese, lettuce, tomato, kosher pickles, caramelized or red onion, & mayo on a brioche bun. Served w/ side of fries.
CRISPY COD WRAP
​Alaskan beer battered cod filets, American cheese, caramelized onions & Rip-Tide ranch w/spring mix wrapped in a spinach tortilla
PORK BELLY BANH MI
Char Siu style bbq pork, pickled cucumber, carrots and onions, cilantro, fresh jalapeno and Sriracha mayo on sweet baguette
SOURDOUGH GRILLED CHEESE PANINI
Jack, cheddar and American cheeses,on thick sliced sourdough (Veg) ADD: Bacon, Ham or Tomato
Avocado
Chipotle Chicken club
​Marinated chicken breast, melted ghost pepper jack, applewood smoked bacon, chipotle mayo & beer battered onion rings on garlic toasted ciabatta – ADD: Avocado
Cubano
Smoked pork shoulder, maple smoked ham, melted swiss, kosher pickle, pickled jalapeno, dijon aioli, french roll
Cold Sandwiches
ALL SANDWICHES SERVED W/ HOUSE-MADE CHIPS OR FRESH TOSSED SALAD
SOUTHWEST VEGAN WRAP
Hummus, black beans, avocado, tomato, sweet corn, pickled jalapenos, crispy fried corn tortilla strips, chipotle pesto, & organic romaine wrapped in a tomato tortilla
– (V)
JOHNNY UTAH
Smoked turkey, chipotle mayo, avocado, smoked gouda, fresh tomato & sprouts on 9 grain bread
ITALIANO
Mortadella, dry-cured capicola, provolone, roasted tomatoes, pepperoncini, pickles, EVOO, balsamic and pesto, w/spring mix on a toasted ciabatta roll
SURF CITY GRINDER
Smoked turkey, fire-braised ham, provolone, shredded lettuce, fresh tomato, pepperoncini, red onion, olive oil, red wine vinegar, salt & pepper on French roll
Uncle Roy's BLT
Applewood smoked bacon, organic romaine, tomato, avocado, roasted garlic mayo, 9 grain bread
Mr Natural
Avocado, cucumbers, tomato, red onion, sprouts, romaine, monterey jack, roasted garlic mayo, 9 grain bread
– (V)
salads
CLASSIC CAESAR
Romaine, house-made croutons, parmesan cheese, oven roasted marinated tomatoes, creamy Caesar dressing
House Salad
Organic spring mix, carrots, grape tomatoes, cucumbers and house vinaigrette
share
Garlic Fries
(V) Christopher ranch garlic, house seasoning, extra virgin olive oil, cilantro, parmesan, pickled jalapenos
Beer Barnacles
Tater tots, spicy habanero cheese sauce, Applewood smoked bacon and scallions EPIC!
LOCO LOADED FRIES
Crispy fries, smoked pork shoulder, habanero cheese sauce, chipotle pesto, hatch green chilis, rip-tide ranch
sweets

About the Business
Cafe El Palomar provides a quick-serve spot on the beach for enjoying Mexican and American favorites. Guests can stop in for breakfast, lunch and dinner and enjoy the stunning views of the Santa Cruz Yacht Harbor. There are also outdoor dining options that let you enjoy the weather, a great meal and watching the ocean. Make sure to meet up with friends for happy hour specials and an NFL happy hour on game days. Start the meal at Cafe El Palomar with appetizers, which include nachos, chicken flautas, quesadillas, ceviche cocktail jalapeno poppers and buffalo wings. Lunch specials are available each day, including carne asada, chile relleno, homemade tamales adn burritos. Check out the Cafe El Palomar house specialties, combinations and seafood platters. There are also vegetarian plates, along with vegan-friendly beans and rice. Dishes are also prepared in olive or vegetable oil only.

About the Business
Indulge in a taste sensation at Los Viejones Taco Truck, where we are dedicated to delivering excellent customer service and rich, traditional Mexican flavors. Our specialty lies in the art of crafting Quesabirrias – slow-cooked seasoned beef embraced by a melty cheese haven, encased in a warm tortilla. Join us as we bring a slice of Mexico to your palate and enrich our community with the joy of authentic cuisine.

About the Business
At Señor Chilaquiles, savor the vibrant, soul-warming flavors of authentic Mexican cuisine, crafted from recipes passed down through generations. Dive into crispy chilaquiles drenched in tangy red or green salsa, topped with queso fresco and a fried egg; savor soft tacos bursting with carne asada or zesty al pastor; indulge in hearty burritos stuffed with seasoned rice and savory meats; or enjoy gooey quesadillas and loaded nachos paired with fresh guacamole and pico de gallo. Our enchiladas, smothered in rich chile sauce, and refreshing margaritas, hand-shaken with premium tequila and fresh lime, complete the fiesta. Every dish celebrates Mexico’s culinary heritage with bold, unforgettable flavors!
…

Starters

Green pepper stuffed with Andhra spices and deep fried. Served with home style chutneys.

Cut chilli peppers double fried in chickpea flour

Andhra style, crispy fried lentil dumplings with fine chopped onion, chilies and fresh coriander. Served with home style chutneys.

-lunch specials Thali -
What is Thali ?
Thali is an Indian word for "plate" — a classic Indian platter of different dishes to
create a perfectly balanced meal.
What you Get
Each Entre Accompanied by Dal, Rice, Naan, mix pickle, salad, raita and dessert.
Vegan Thali

papadum.

Our Menu
Menu
Gluten - Free Menu
V - Vegetarian • ** Indicates Spicy Dish. Available in Mild, Medium, Hot or Very Hot • *Gluten-Free menu available upon request  • “Limit of 3 credit card transactions per group” • 20% gratuity added for parties of 6 or more • Cake cutting fee $2.50 per person | 4% ACA Healthcare charge will be added to each check | Corkage fee of $25 for 750mL, $50 for 1.5L Magnum; 2 Bottle Maximum
Appetizers
Samosas (V)
$13.50/+
$13.50 - 3 Pieces | $23.90 - 6 Pieces • Turnover filled with potatoes, red onions, peas, carrots and a blend of unique spices served with special house sauce.
Fried Tofu
$13.50
Deep-fried soft tofu seasoned and served with a tangy chili sauce.
Northern Fried Tofu
$15.35
Homemade tofu made from yellow bean powder and served with soy chili sauce.
Lettuce Wrap
$16.60
Lettuce wrap with radish, carrots, green bell peppers, mushrooms and water chestnuts Tofu. All tossed in special house sauce • Add $3.00 for Chicken, $5 for Shrimp
Palata
$15.35
Multi-layer bread served with Coconut Chicken • Sub $2.00 for Vegetarian Curry, or Sub $3.00 for Lamb Curry
Salt and Pepper
$18.70
Choice of crisp Calamari, Fish or Shrimp; topped with scallions, jalapenos and fried garlic, served with tangy chili sauce • Sub Fish or Shrimp Add $5.00
Lotus Chips
$11.95
Thinly sliced deep fried Lotus Roots, served with house sauce
Pot Stickers
$10.35
Deep fried Pot Stickers with Pork filling.
Spring Rolls (Vegetarian)
$10.35
Deep fried Spring Rolls with Vegetable filling.
Soups
Monk Hingar* (Catfish Chowder)
$18.25
This famous traditional dish can be eaten anytime at any occasion. Thin rice noodles in a rich soup made from ground catfish, ginger, lemongrass, onion, garlic and fried rice powder. Served with hard-boiled egg, fried yellow peas and cilantro.
Ohnoh Kawt Swe (Coconut Noodle Soup)
$19.25
A rich and creamy coconut bisque with egg noodles. Served with chicken, garnished with onion, cilantro and crispy wonton chips.
Samosa Soup (V)
$18.70
A delicious soup made with samosas, potatoes, onions, lentils, cabbage, falafel and jalapenos.
Salads
Served with romaine lettuce or the traditional Burmese style with cabbage
Tea Leaf Salad
$19.75
This salad is a popular traditional treat unique to Burma. A mix of Burmese tea leaves, fried garlic, yellow beans, peanuts, sesame seeds, sunflower seeds, lettuce, tomatoes, jalapenos and dried shrimp. This special salad will awaken your taste buds. (Vegetarian option available)  Add Extra Tea Leaf $5.95
Ruby Rainbow Salad
$19.50
This salad is made from 4 different types of noodles, fried tofu, thinly sliced onions, cucumbers, fried garlic, cabbage, cilantro, papaya, yellow bean powder, wonton chips, potatoes and topped with spicy rice. (Vegetarian option available)
Samosa Salad (V)
$18.75
Salad with vegetarian samosas, cabbage, onions, cilantro, cucumbers, yellow bean powder, tamarind sauce, mint, sesame seeds with crushed red chili added to taste.
Burmese chicken Salad
$19.75
Bite-sized fried chicken with sliced red onions, fried onions, roasted bean powder, fried garlic, cilantro, wonton chips, sesame seeds and tamarind dressing with red crushed chili seasoned to taste.
Mango Salad
$18.50
Shredded pickled mangoes served with fried onions, fried garlic, cabbage, red onions, yellow bean powder, cucumbers, cilantro and dried shrimp. (Vegetarian option available)
Ginger Salad
$18.70
Light and refreshing; this salad is mixed with pickled ginger, fried garlic, yellow beans, sesame seeds, sunflower seeds, jalapenos, peanuts and dried shrimp. (Vegetarian option available)
Noodles
Nan Gyi Dok
$19.25
Our traditional Burmese dish with rice noodles topped with coconut chicken sauce, yellow bean powder, cilantro and fried onions. Topped with hard-boiled egg and crispy wontons.
Rangoon Noodle
$17.65
Egg noodles tossed with tofu, cucumbers, cilantro, tomatoes, cabbage, chili sauce, dried shrimp powder, bean sprouts, potatoes and wonton chips. (Vegan option available)
Garlic Noodle
$17.20
Egg noodles, crisp garlic, cucumber and scallions tossed in a special house sauce. Served with a choice of Fried Tofu & Broccoli, BBQ Pork, Chicken, or Shrimp •(Sub $3 for BBQ Pork or Chicken, or Sub $5 for Shrimp)
Burmese Pad Thai*
$19.25
Our most popular dish is a play on a classic. Rice noodles tossed with red bell peppers, onions, baby bok choy, cabbage, peanuts, bean sprouts and scrambled egg. Served with a choice of Tofu, Chicken or Shrimp • Sub $3.00 for Chicken, or Sub $5.00 for Shrimp (Vegan Option Available)
Vegetables and Tofu
Ruby String Beans*
$18.70
String beans served with garlic and ginger in a soy-based sauce.
Baby Bok choy (Seasonal)
$16.65
Young tender baby bok choy stir fried with white wine and garlic.
Broccoli & Garlic
$17.45
Broccoli tossed in wok with white wine, garlic, ginger and garnished with fried onions.
Mango Tofu*
$20.30
Tofu tossed in wok with basil, onions and mango puree. Served with fresh mango on the side.
Fiery Tofu & Vegetables*
$19.50
Wok fried tofu, string beans, bell peppers and basil in a sweet and spicy sauce.
Eggplant & Garlic*
$18.70
Fried eggplant with garlic and scallions in a sweet chili sauce.
Veggie Kebat**
$19.25
A mix of vegetables and tofu stir-fried with paprika, masala, tamarind, jalapenos, mint leaves, tomatoes, onions and cilantro.
Yellow Tofu, Red Curry**
$19.50
Yellow tofu cooked in a Burmese style curry.
Burmese Eggplant Curry**
$19.25
Fried eggplant curried with onion, garlic and ginger.
Egg & Okra Curry**
$20.30
Red Burmese curry prepared with tomatoes, fried hard-boiled egg and okra.
Mixed Vegetable Curry**
$19.50

About the Business
Craving an unforgettable culinary journey?
Opening June 7th, 2025, Chandni Chowk brings the vibrant flavors of India to Milpitas!
Located on Milmont Drive, our restaurant promises an authentic dining experience, transporting you to the heart of Chandni Chowk with every bite. Get ready to savor traditional recipes, crafted with passion and the freshest ingredients. We invite you to explore the rich tapestry of Indian cuisine and discover your new favorite dish.

Epilepsy Safe Mode

This mode enables people with epilepsy to use the website safely by eliminating the risk of seizures that result from flashing or blinking animations and risky color combinations.

Chaat Cafe
Accessibility Statement
Accessibility Statement
chaatcafe.com
September 29, 2025
Compliance status
We firmly believe that the internet should be available and accessible to anyone, and are committed to providing a website that is accessible to the widest possible audience,
regardless of circumstance and ability.
To fulfill this, we aim to adhere as strictly as possible to the World Wide Web Consortium’s (W3C) Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.1 (WCAG 2.1) at the AA level.
These guidelines explain how to make web content accessible to people with a wide array of disabilities. Complying with those guidelines helps us ensure that the website is accessible
to all people: blind people, people with motor impairments, visual impairment, cognitive disabilities, and more.
This website utilizes various technologies that are meant to make it as accessible as possible at all times. We utilize an accessibility interface that allows persons with specific
disabilities to adjust the website’s UI (user interface) and design it to their personal needs.
Additionally, the website utilizes an AI-based application that runs in the background and optimizes its accessibility level constantly. This application remediates the website’s HTML,
adapts Its functionality and behavior for screen-readers used by the blind users, and for keyboard functions used by individuals with motor impairments.
If you’ve found a malfunction or have ideas for improvement, we’ll be happy to hear from you. You can reach out to the website’s operators by using the following email
Screen-reader and keyboard navigation
Our website implements the ARIA attributes (Accessible Rich Internet Applications) technique, alongside various different behavioral changes, to ensure blind users visiting with
screen-readers are able to read, comprehend, and enjoy the website’s functions. As soon as a user with a screen-reader enters your site, they immediately receive
a prompt to enter the Screen-Reader Profile so they can browse and operate your site effectively. Here’s how our website covers some of the most important screen-reader requirements,
alongside console screenshots of code examples:
Screen-reader optimization:
we run a background process that learns the website’s components from top to bottom, to ensure ongoing compliance even when updating the website.
	In this process, we provide screen-readers with meaningful data using the ARIA set of attributes. For example, we provide accurate form labels;
	descriptions for actionable icons (social media icons, search icons, cart icons, etc.); validation guidance for form inputs; element roles such as buttons, menus, modal dialogues (popups),
	and others. Additionally, the background process scans all the website’s images and provides an accurate and meaningful image-object-recognition-based description as an ALT (alternate text) tag
	for images that are not described. It will also extract texts that are embedded within the image, using an OCR (optical character recognition) technology.
	To turn on screen-reader adjustments at any time, users need only to press the Alt+1 keyboard combination. Screen-reader users also get automatic announcements to turn the Screen-reader mode on
	as soon as they enter the website.
These adjustments are compatible with all popular screen readers, including JAWS and NVDA.
Keyboard navigation optimization:
The background process also adjusts the website’s HTML, and adds various behaviors using JavaScript code to make the website operable by the keyboard. This includes the ability to navigate the website using the Tab and Shift+Tab keys, operate dropdowns with the arrow keys, close them with Esc, trigger buttons and links using the Enter key, navigate between radio and checkbox elements using the arrow keys, and fill them in with the Spacebar or Enter key.Additionally, keyboard users will find quick-navigation and content-skip menus, available at any time by clicking Alt+1, or as the first elements of the site while navigating with the keyboard. The background process also handles triggered popups by moving the keyboard focus towards them as soon as they appear, and not allow the focus drift outside it.
Users can also use shortcuts such as “M” (menus), “H” (headings), “F” (forms), “B” (buttons), and “G” (graphics) to jump to specific elements.
Disability profiles supported in our website
Epilepsy Safe Mode:
this profile enables people with epilepsy to use the website safely by eliminating the risk of seizures that result from flashing or blinking animations and risky color combinations.
Visually Impaired Mode:
this mode adjusts the website for the convenience of users with visual impairments such as Degrading Eyesight, Tunnel Vision, Cataract, Glaucoma, and others.
Cognitive Disability Mode:
this mode provides different assistive options to help users with cognitive impairments such as Dyslexia, Autism, CVA, and others, to focus on the essential elements of the website more easily.
ADHD Friendly Mode:
this mode helps users with ADHD and Neurodevelopmental disorders to read, browse, and focus on the main website elements more easily while significantly reducing distractions.
Blindness Mode:
this mode configures the website to be compatible with screen-readers such as JAWS, NVDA, VoiceOver, and TalkBack. A screen-reader is software for blind users that is installed on a  computer and smartphone, and websites must be compatible with it.
Keyboard Navigation Profile (Motor-Impaired):
this profile enables motor-impaired persons to operate the website using the keyboard Tab, Shift+Tab, and the Enter keys. Users can also use shortcuts such as “M” (menus), “H” (headings), “F” (forms), “B” (buttons), and “G” (graphics) to jump to specific elements.
Additional UI, design, and readability adjustments
Font adjustments –
users, can increase and decrease its size, change its family (type), adjust the spacing, alignment, line height, and more.
Color adjustments –
users can select various color contrast profiles such as light, dark, inverted, and monochrome. Additionally, users can swap color schemes of titles, texts, and backgrounds, with over seven different coloring options.
Animations –
person with epilepsy can stop all running animations with the click of a button. Animations controlled by the interface include videos, GIFs, and CSS flashing transitions.
Content highlighting –
users can choose to emphasize important elements such as links and titles. They can also choose to highlight focused or hovered elements only.
Audio muting –
users with hearing devices may experience headaches or other issues due to automatic audio playing. This option lets users mute the entire website instantly.
Cognitive disorders –
we utilize a search engine that is linked to Wikipedia and Wiktionary, allowing people with cognitive disorders to decipher meanings of phrases, initials, slang, and others.
Additional functions –
we provide users the option to change cursor color and size, use a printing mode, enable a virtual keyboard, and many other functions.
Browser and assistive technology compatibility
We aim to support the widest array of browsers and assistive technologies as possible, so our users can choose the best fitting tools for them, with as few limitations as possible. Therefore, we have worked very hard to be able to support all major systems that comprise over 95% of the user market share including Google Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Apple Safari, Opera and Microsoft Edge, JAWS and NVDA (screen readers).
Notes, comments, and feedback
Despite our very best efforts to allow anybody to adjust the website to their needs. There may still be pages or sections that are not fully accessible, are in the process of becoming accessible, or are lacking an adequate technological solution to make them accessible. Still, we are continually improving our accessibility, adding, updating and improving its options and features, and developing and adopting new technologies. All this is meant to reach the optimal level of accessibility, following technological advancements. For any assistance, please reach out to
For full functionality of this site it is necessary to enable JavaScript.

Culinary Delights
Delve into a world of authentic flavors and spices. Karimi Restaurant presents a menu that captures the essence of India and Pakistan. Explore our curated selection of dishes crafted to elevate your dining experience.
Order Online
Starter
Bhel Puri
Freshly prepared Bombay street snack of Rice flakes mixed with fresh onions, sev peanuts and tomatoes with sweet chutney and mint sauce
Aaloo Tikki
Freshly made mashed potatoes patty mixed with some herbs and deep fried served with choley and chutney
Aaloo Tikki Chaat
Freshly made potatoes patty, choley, chutney and yogurt
Vegetable Samosa
Deep fried flaky pastry filled with potatoes, onions and Indian spices
Samosa Chaat
Mouthwatering combination of smashed vegetable samosas, yogurt, onions and cilantro with sweet tamarind chutney
Dahi Wada (Dahi Bhalla)
Soft Wada with sweet yogurt and tamarind sauce
Order Now
Lively Atmosphere & Delicious Indian Food at Karimi's
Karimi's is, like, the best Indian food ever! Seriously, it comes out crazy fast, and the portions are, like, perfect. They have tons of customers, so it's always a fun vibe to just sit and watch people. Plus, parking is a breeze. The service is, like, super friendly too.
Kate R.
Back in SJ, Craving Karimi's (and Their Butter Chicken!)
Back in SJ after grad school and NEEDED Karimi's! Garlic naan, butter chicken (divorce-worthy!), jeera rice, and mango lassi - perfection! Super friendly.
Sarah M.
A Delicious Homecoming
Karimi offers a unique blend of Indian, Pakistani, and Chinese dishes, all made with high-quality ingredients. Their commitment to authenticity makes it a great destination for anyone seeking a delicious and satisfying meal.
Imran G.
Find Out Why Our Customers Keep Coming Back!
What our customers say

inquiry
For weekly corporate lunch program, any other specific questions, recommendations, feedback
Email:
info@erthya.com
Reservation
Please call us or visit OpenTable to make a reservation. We happily accept online bookings for parties of up to 12 guests. For larger groups or special requests, please email us at info@erthya.com
Parking
Ample parking is available for your convenience, ensuring a stress-free arrival. Whether you’re visiting for a quick meal or a special event, our spacious parking area accommodates vehicles of all sizes, making your experience seamless from the moment you arrive.
Bring your own Cake
Guests are welcome to bring a cake to celebrate special occasions. A service fee of $5 per person will apply, with a maximum charge of $50 per group.
Corkage
For guests wishing to bring their own wine (sparkling or still), we allow up to two bottles. A corkage fee of $50 per bottle will be applied.
Cancellation & No-Show Policy
A fee of $10 per person will apply for no-shows or for reservations canceled less than 24 hours prior to the reserved time. This policy helps us accommodate other guests and manage our operations effectively.
Service Charges
An 18% service charge will be applied to parties of 5-7 guests, while parties of 8 or more will incur a 20% service charge. These charges are applied to provide the best possible service to larger groups.
Corporate and Private Events
Please email us on
info@erthya.com
or call us @ (408) 899-6171. We will call you within 48 hours.
We appreciate your understanding and cooperation with these policies and look forward to making your visit a memorable one!
We will call you within 48 hours.

Lunch Buffet
Our lunch buffet is the best way to sample a wide range of dishes from the menu, plus some more! The extravagant spread includes salads, veg and non-veg appetizers, fresh tandoori items, tava specials, live chaat stations, rice & biryani, veg and non veg main course, lentils, tandoori breads, decadent desserts and a tea.

Our Menu
A celebration of rich flavors, our menu brings together the best of Bengali, Indian, and Indo-Chinese cuisine. From street food favorites to royal delicacies, every dish is crafted with passion and authenticity. Savor tradition, spice, and innovation in every bite.
A celebration of rich flavors, our menu brings together the best of Bengali, Indian, and Indo-Chinese cuisine. From street food favorites to royal delicacies, every dish is crafted with passion and authenticity. Savor tradition, spice, and innovation in every bite.

Menu
Thali
The beauty of a vegetarian thali lies in its variety and the opportunity to experience a range of flavors and textures in a single sitting. It showcases the culinary diversity of India, with each dish thoughtfully prepared to harmonize with the others, resulting in a satisfying and balanced meal.
Regular Thali
$17.99
Tuesday, Wednesday and Thursday:3 Curries, Dal, Kadhi, Roti, Poori, Snacks, Papad, Masala Chaas and Dessert all unlimited

Royal Thali

About Us
DISCOVER OUR STORY
Our disclaimer is that on the off chance that youâre anticipating overwhelming, slick, undesirable Indian nourishment, âHyderabad Dum Biryaniâ isnât the place for you. Our expectation is that youâll join the developing pattern that such a large number

GOOD FOOD IS OUR PASSION
DISCOVER OUT STORY
We want to share our passion for the excellent food and great service. We cook our dishes from the freshest ingredients. We specialize in Dum Biryani, Tandoori, Desserts and much more in a warm friendly atmosphere. People visit restaurants on various
                    occasions.
Some like celebrating birthdays there, while others consider these places as the best ones for business meetings. Couples in love also go out on romantic dates there. Many individuals visit restaurants just to have a delicious
                    meal, especially those who donât like cooking. A lot of dishes are quite challenging to cook at home, without proficiency in the culinary art.

You can rely on our amazing features list and also our customer service will be great experience for you without a doubt
Sarfraz
Finally found a place to satisfy my thirst for mutton biryani.. flavor and taste was really good.. best biryani I had so far here in Bay area
Priyanka C.
If you want to have Hyderabadi Dum Biryani in the Bay Area, this is the place to be!!!I tried biryani at several other restaurants and this place is cut above the rest.
Drea L.
This place just seems to do it right with all aspects of a flavorful briyani. The rice is perfectly cooked, the meat is tender and everything is perfectly seasoned.
Deepa B.
This hole in the wall restaurant has the best Hyderabadi Biryani in Bay Area. Love their cut-mirchi and chicken hariyali too.
Katie P.
Very authentic taste. One of the best biryanis you can have in Bay Area. We went to the restaurant and ordered apollo fish and mutton biryani for takeout and asked for both the dishes to be spicy. We were surprised with both quality and quantity of the
                                        dishes, will definitely come back for sure.
Robbie I.
My favorite go-to Indian Dish! Their Butter Chicken and garlic naan never disappoints and the food always makes you wanna order for more. Also, Rashna was very accommodating and straightforward.

Everest Cuisine Menu
At Everest Cuisine, our menu is crafted with the tastes and preferences of the Bay Area food enthusiasts in mind, celebrating the local palate with authentic and popular dishes from the land of the Himalayas. From classic, comforting dishes to bold, exciting flavors, our selection promises a culinary experience that reflects the vibrant tastes of Bay Area's diners.

Order From San Jose
Order from Mountain View
Our Specialties
At Everest Cuisine, our specialties showcase the culinary expertise of our chefs, who bring years of experience and passion to each dish. With perfected recipes, we offer a rich array of mouthwatering Indian curries, aromatic biryanis, and Nepalese dishes like Chowmein and Jhol Momo, each crafted to honor traditional flavors and techniques.
Explore our Amazing Food!
Titanic Jhol Momo
Titanic Jhol Momo is something that you don't want to miss at Everest Cuisine. The aroma and taste of the soup combined perfectly with the juicy dumplings inside for an explosion of flavors with every bite.
Steamed Momo
Famous Nepalese dumplings filled with either vegetable or ground chicken (Choice of Veg or Chicken), cumin, and coriander. Served with Nepali tomato achar and spicy chili sauce on the side.
Fried Momo
Deep fried Nepalese dumplings (momo) till brown and crisp and served with tomato sauce and chili sauce.
Chicken Lollipop
Delicious chicken appetizer, deep-fried and served with hot garlic sauce.

Savor the Flavors of the Himalayas
Everest Cuisine brings the authentic flavors of the Himalayas to the vibrant Bay Area of California. With a menu inspired by the rich culinary traditions of Nepal and India, Everest Cuisine offers a unique dining experience that captures the essence of Himalayan culture. From hearty momos (dumplings) to aromatic curries and spices reminiscent of the majestic mountains, every dish tells a story of tradition, warmth, and authenticity. Perfect for food enthusiasts seeking a taste of the exotic, Everest Cuisine promises an unforgettable culinary journey.

About Us
A few words about
IRAKLIS
At Iraklis, our mission is to bring you the best of the Mediterranean in a quick, convenient, and delicious way. We believe in using only the freshest, top-quality ingredients to create mouthwatering Mediterranean meals that not only taste great but also provide excellent value for your money. Our quick-serve restaurant is your destination for authentic Mediterranean favorites, made to order, promoting a balanced and wholesome diet. We’re here to satisfy your cravings for Mediterranean cuisine without compromising on quality, speed, or taste.
Our Menu
Plate
Lamb
Lamb marinated with a blend of traditional spices, grilled to perfection.  Served over rice, with a side of homemade hummus, pickled turnips,  and salad topped with our rich tahini sauce.

Additional Service Charges:
Outdoor Catering minimum $1000 for Food + Service Charges + Equipment Charges+ 10% of Gratuity of total amount (If the distance is more than 20 miles then minimum order value will change).
For Delivery Option, Minimum Order Value Of $300 Required + Delivery Charges (If the distance is more than 20 miles then minimum order value will change)+ 10% of Gratuity of total amount.
For Curbside Delivery Minimum Charges are $50 Up-To 10 Miles And $5 Per Extra Mile
For Delivery In Park/Venue charges may vary depends upon venue location ( like 2nd or 3rd floor, Stairs in way, beach, grass area) we need to send no. of people accordingly.
On-Site Catering Service Charge $250 Per Professional Chef ( for Bhatura, Dosa, Tandoor) Upto 4 hours service time including travel time.
For Server (flat charges $200 per person upto 4 hours service time including travel time)
Bartender for Wine, Beer, Whisky $300 and for Cocktails & Mocktails charges are $400 for 4 hours including travel time.
Chaffing Dish With Serving Spoons And Burner $30 each.
Buffet Setup Fee $100
China Ware And Disposable Cutlery Available Upon Request With Additional Charges.
CUSTOMIZE TO YOUR NEEDS!
We understand that every event is unique and we are happy to create special catering packages in keeping with your preferences. To create your customized package, please contact Catering team at 408.773.1100 or email
chaatbhavancatering@gmail.com

name: Tiranga 47
raw_text:
Tiranga 47 - Authentic Indian Food in Milpitas, CA
Loading...
Order Online
Home
About
Menu
Contact
Gallery
Testimonials
A Taste of India, Right at Your Doorstep!
From aromatic spices to traditional recipes, every dish is crafted to perfection, giving you an unforgettable culinary experience.
Authenticity in Every Bite!
With carefully sourced ingredients and age-old recipes, we ensure each dish at Tiranga 47 is as authentic as it gets, delivering the true essence of Indian cuisine.
Your Journey to India Starts Here!
Let your taste buds travel through the vibrant streets of India with our signature dishes.
Authentic Flavors
We stay true to our roots, using traditional spices and recipes straight from India.
Diverse Menu
From spicy street snacks to hearty main courses and delightful desserts, our menu caters to every taste.
Cultural Experience
We donât just serve food; we offer a piece of India with every meal. Experience the culture, taste the tradition.
Fast & Friendly Service
We pride ourselves on providing top-notch service, so you can enjoy your meal with a smile.
About Us
Welcome to Tiranga 47
Tiranga 47
was born from a desire to share the rich and diverse culinary heritage of India with food lovers in the USA. Inspired by the Indian flag and the year of India's independence, our food truck symbolizes freedom, unity, and the vibrant spirit of Indian cuisine.
From the flavorful chaats of Delhi to the aromatic curries of Kerala, our menu is a carefully curated journey through Indiaâs culinary landscape. Whether you're grabbing a quick bite or indulging in a full meal, we promise every dish is prepared with love and tradition. At Tiranga 47 food is more than a mealâitâs a celebration of culture, flavors, and history.
Founder's Introduction :
Tiranga 47 is the brainchild of
Kuldip Singh Dhillon
, a culinary expert with over 28 years of experience in the restaurant industry. Kuldip began his journey at the renowned
Yellow Chilli alongside celebrity chef Sanjeev Kapoor
, where he mastered the art of creating authentic Indian flavors. He then spent 15 years honing his skills at
Amber India
, a staple of Indian fine dining in the USA. Kuldip further expanded his expertise with 5 years at
Mountain View Sakoon Restaurant
, known for its rich Indian cuisine. His passion for food and commitment to quality have culminated in Tiranga 47, where he brings his vast experience and love for Indian food to every dish.

$19.75

A mix of Burmese tea leaves, fried garlic, yellow beans, peanuts, sesame seeds, sunflower seeds, lettuce, tomatoes, jalapenos and dried shrimp. This special salad will awaken your taste buds. About the Business
Business owner information
Aleena T.
Business Owner
Our meal boxes are carefully crafted to provide a complete meal experience, with all the necessary components for a healthy and satisfying meal. One of the main advantages of our meal boxes is the ease and convenience they offer. With just one box, you can enjoy a variety of flavors and textures without having to worry about different dishes from multiple boxes, heating, re-heating and everything that takes away from enjoying a meal. It makes the entire process of getting a meal much easier, especially for busy individuals who don't have time to prepare their meals.

About the Business
Business owner information
Raj S.
Business Owner
Dil Se Eatery is the top-rated Indian food truck in Cupertino, CA. A favorite among locals and visitors, there's a reason for all the hype. The quality of spices and ingredients we use is easy to taste and unlike any other.

At Dil Se Eatery we are committed to providing fresh, wholesome hearty Indian food. Our chefs stick to authentic recipes, bringing you exotic, authentic, pungent flavors from the heart of India. A taste that's unique, yet so addicting that your taste buds will have you craving for more. Since we are a mobile food truck, you can rest knowing Dil Se Eatery is never too far away.

Our rotating menu includes many curries and other favorites. Everything we serve is made from scratch using local ingredients, creating the rich flavors Dil Se is known for. All our curries are Gluten Free and we offer Vegan options. Dil Se means "from the heart", which shows how we truly feel about what we serve and who we serve it to.

True Indian cooking at its finest! Have lunch plans today? Dil Se Eatery always makes a great date.

Everest Cuisine Menu
At Everest Cuisine, our menu is crafted with the tastes and preferences of the Bay Area food enthusiasts in mind, celebrating the local palate with authentic and popular dishes from the land of the Himalayas. From classic, comforting dishes to bold, exciting flavors, our selection promises a culinary experience that reflects the vibrant tastes of Bay Area's diners.
Chicken Chowmein
Chicken Steam Momo
Veg Steam Momo
Mixed Veg Curry
Thali Special
Chicken Fried Rice
Pepper Fried Chicken
Paneer Pakora
Chicken Manchurian
Order From San Jose
Order from Mountain View
Our Specialties
At Everest Cuisine, our specialties showcase the culinary expertise of our chefs, who bring years of experience and passion to each dish. With perfected recipes, we offer a rich array of mouthwatering Indian curries, aromatic biryanis, and Nepalese dishes like Chowmein and Jhol Momo, each crafted to honor traditional flavors and techniques.
Explore our Amazing Food!
Titanic Jhol Momo
Titanic Jhol Momo is something that you don't want to miss at Everest Cuisine. The aroma and taste of the soup combined perfectly with the juicy dumplings inside for an explosion of flavors with every bite.
Steamed Momo
Famous Nepalese dumplings filled with either vegetable or ground chicken (Choice of Veg or Chicken), cumin, and coriander. Served with Nepali tomato achar and spicy chili sauce on the side.
Fried Momo
Deep fried Nepalese dumplings (momo) till brown and crisp and served with tomato sauce and chili sauce.
Chicken Lollipop
Delicious chicken appetizer, deep-fried and served with hot garlic sauce.

San Jose

Savor the Flavors of the Himalayas
Everest Cuisine brings the authentic flavors of the Himalayas to the vibrant Bay Area of California. With a menu inspired by the rich culinary traditions of Nepal and India, Everest Cuisine offers a unique dining experience that captures the essence of Himalayan culture. From hearty momos (dumplings) to aromatic curries and spices reminiscent of the majestic mountains, every dish tells a story of tradition, warmth, and authenticity. Perfect for food enthusiasts seeking a taste of the exotic, Everest Cuisine promises an unforgettable culinary journey.
b

Located in the Bay Area
We are located in San Jose and Mountain View.
What our Diners Say
"A gem in the Bay Area"
"If you're looking for a fresh and authentic Indian and Nepalese dining experience in the Bay Area,
Everest Cuisine
is a must-visit! The restaurant offers a remarkable mix of flavors that capture the essence of traditional Indian and Nepalese cuisine."
Catherine Reed, Food Blogger

Adora POS, LLC Privacy Policy
INTRODUCTION
Adora POS LLC (“Adora”) is committed to providing our Clients and Customers, defined below, with exceptional service.
    Providing this service involves the collection, use, and disclosure of certain personal information about our Clients and Customers.
    Protecting our Clients’ and Customers’ personal information is one of Adora’s top priorities.
SCOPE OF THIS POLICY
This Privacy Policy applies to all personal information collected by Adora through its services, website(s), and applications.
DEFINITIONS
“Clients” are stores and business owners that engage Adora to provide online ordering services.
“Customers” are individuals who place online orders through the Adora point of sale system or related websites (collectively the “POS System”).
PERSONAL INFORMATION COLLECTED
Personal information is any information that specifically identifies you or would enable someone to personally identify you.
    This includes but is not limited to your name, address, telephone/fax number, email address, commercial information, biometric information,
    internet activity, geolocation data, or any other information you submit through the POS System which identifies you individually.
    Adora also automatically receives and records information on its server logs from your browser including your IP address,
    cookie information, and the web page(s) you have visited.
DISCLOSURE, SHARING, AND SALE OF PERSONAL INFORMATION AND RIGHT TO OPT-OUT
Adora will not disclose any personal information about any Customer or Client to any person or entity except:
    (i) Adora will share personal information about a Customer with the Client from whom the Customer places an order,
    (ii) Adora may provide personal information to its vendors and suppliers when necessary to process data,
    complete transactions, and comply with contractual obligations,
    (iii) Adora may share certain personal information with its affiliates in order to complete transactions, and
    (iv) Adora may release personal information to comply with applicable law, to enforce or apply the terms of any user agreement,
    or to protect the rights, property or safety of Adora, Customers and Clients, or others.
    You may opt-out by requesting that Adora stop sharing and selling your information, including by using an email unsubscribe feature,
    notifying Adora or a location where the POS System is used, or by text opt-out.
    Adora will not sell your personally identifiable information to anyone.
USE OF IP ADDRESSES
Adora may use your IP address to help diagnose problems with our server, and to administer our website.
    Adora may also use your IP address to identify you when necessary to enforce compliance with this Privacy Policy or our website’s Terms of Use,
    or to protect our services, website, systems, information, employees, business partners, service providers, users, Clients, Customers, or others.
PROTECTION OF INFORMATION COLLECTED AND SECURITY POLICY
Adora takes various physical, technical, administrative, and organizational security measures to protect your payment and personal information
    from accidental or unlawful destruction, unauthorized disclosure, or access. Adora’s Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) software is the industry standard
    and among the best software available today for secure commerce transactions. The SSL software encrypts all of your personal information
    that is collected, including credit card number, name and address, so that it cannot be read over the internet.
    However, no online activity is guaranteed to be 100% secure and Adora cannot ensure or warrant the security of any information that you provide.
RIGHT TO DELETE
You may request that Adora delete any personal information that Adora has collected from you except where the information is required
    to fulfill the transaction, contractual obligations, security, fraud detection, and legal compliance.
NON-DISCRIMINATION
By requesting that your personal information be deleted or by opting out of the sharing or selling of your information,
    your level of service and pricing will not be affected.
RIGHT TO ACCESS/RIGHT TO CORRECT
You may request that Adora provide access to your information that it has collected and you may request that Adora correct
    any of the personal information collected that is not correct.
ADORA’S MESSAGING SERVICE AND PRIVACY POLICY
As to information collected by Adora through its SMS Messaging Service, its’ privacy policy terms and provisions for this service are as follows:
COLLECTION OF INFORMATION
Adora POS, LLC (“Adora”) uses the Messaging Service (the “Service”) to collect information from and about you including but not limited to
    your name, telephone number, email address, commercial information, messaging history, biometric data, internet activity, geolocation data,
    protected classification data, and inferences drawn from other personal information to create consumer profiles.
    Adora may also collect information using cookies or similar technologies and information if you contact Adora
    regarding the messaging service or for customer service.
USE OF INFORMATION
The information collected may be used to deliver, analyze, maintain, and support the Service, enhance its features,
    and customize and/or personalize your experience on the Service.
SHARING AND/OR SELLING THE INFORMATION COLLECTED
Adora may share, sell, transfer, or disclose your information to/with third parties, service providers,
    and/or to comply with applicable law and legal processes including requests from public and government agencies.
    Adora may also share aggregate or de-identified information with third parties.
OPTING OUT OF SALE/SHARING OF INFORMATION COLLECTED
You may opt-out of the sale/sharing of your personal information by using an email unsubscribe feature,
    notifying Adora or a location where the POS System is used, or by text opt out.
    Opting out of the sale or sharing of your information will not affect the level of service or pricing you receive.
RIGHT TO REQUEST INFORMATION BE DELETED
You may request that Adora delete your personal information from Adora’s records.
    However, to the extent that the information is required for transaction fulfillment, contractual obligations,
    security, fraud detection, debugging, and/or legal compliance, Adora may deny the request.
    Requesting that your personal information be deleted from the Service will not affect the level of service or pricing you receive.
RIGHT TO REQUEST ACCESS TO INFORMATION
You may also request that Adora provide you with access so that you can see what information about you Adora has collected
    and why it has been collected, sold, shared, transferred, or disclosed.
RIGHT TO LIMIT USE OF INFORMATION
You have the right, at any time, to request that Adora limit its use of your information that it has collected to that which is necessary
    to perform the services or provide the goods that are reasonably expected to be performed or provided, to perform services
    that are authorized by implementing regulations, and to perform services for the following:
    (i) to ensure the security and integrity to the extent the use of your personal information is necessary and proportionate for these purposes,
    (ii) short term, transient use provided that your personal information is not disclosed to another third party and is not used to build a profile about the consumer,
    (iii) performing services on behalf of the business, and
    (iv) maintaining the quality or safety of a service or device or improving or upgrading a service or device.
RIGHT TO CORRECT
You have the right to request that Adora correct any information about you that is incorrect or inaccurate.
FREQUENCY OF SENDING
The number of text messages that you receive will vary depending on the program for which you signed up and the frequency of the messages sent by the program.
MESSAGE AND DATA RATES MAY APPLY
Depending on the terms of your data plan, message and data rates may apply and be charged by your carrier for receiving or sending text messages.
PROTECTION OF INFORMATION COLLECTED
Adora takes a variety of physical, technical, administrative, and organizational security measures to protect the information collected
    from accidental or unlawful destruction or accidental loss, alteration, unauthorized disclosure, or access.
    However, no online activity is guaranteed to be 100% secure and Adora cannot ensure or warrant the security of any information that you provide.
WARRANTY DISCLAIMER
Adora will take reasonable action to verify the accuracy of any information in the Service;
    however, Adora makes no warranties, express or implied, in regard to its accuracy.
    The Service is provided on an “as is” and “as available” basis without any representations or endorsements being made.
    Further, Adora makes no warranties, express or implied, regarding any transaction conducted on or through the Service.
LIMITATION OF LIABILITY
By opting into the Service, you acknowledge that Adora is not responsible for any errors, delays, or failures in delivering text messages
    due to factors beyond our reasonable control, including network issues or your mobile device capabilities.
    You agree to hold Adora harmless for any damages that arise from your use of the Service to the maximum extent allowed by law.
Website Standard Terms and Conditions
Introduction
These Website Standard Terms And Conditions (these “Terms” or these “Website Standard Terms And Conditions”)
            contained herein on this webpage, shall govern your use of this website, including all pages within this website
            (collectively referred to herein below as this “Website”). These Terms apply in full force and effect to your use
            of this Website and by using this Website, you expressly accept all terms and conditions contained herein in full.
            You must not use this Website, if you have any objection to any of these Website Standard Terms And Conditions.
This Website is not for use by any minors (defined as those who are not at least 13 years of age),
            and you must not use this Website if you a minor.
Intellectual Property Rights
Other than content you own, which you may have opted to include on this Website, under these Terms, Adora POS LLC.
            and/or its licensors own all rights to the intellectual property and material contained in this Website,
            and all such rights are reserved.
You are granted a limited license only, subject to the restrictions provided in these Terms,
            for purposes of viewing the material contained on this Website,
Refunds
Refunds for online orders must be requested directly from Merchants, and will be granted at the sole discretion of the Merchants.
            Adora POS LLC will not be responsible for issuing refunds for undelivered food, nor will Adora POS LLC be responsible for any disputed charges with
            any client or credit card companies. Any such inquiries should be directed to our Merchants. Credits for refunded credit card orders
            will only be placed on the credit card used for the original purchase.
Restrictions
You are expressly and emphatically restricted from all of the following:
publishing any Website material in any media;
selling, sublicensing and/or otherwise commercializing any Website material;
publicly performing and/or showing any Website material;
using this Website in any way that is, or may be, damaging to this Website;
using this Website in any way that impacts user access to this Website;
using this Website contrary to applicable laws and regulations, or in a way that causes, or may cause, harm to the Website, or to any person or business entity;
engaging in any data mining, data harvesting, data extracting or any other similar activity in relation to this Website, or while using this Website;
using this Website to engage in any advertising or marketing;
No warranties
This Website is provided “as is,” with all faults, and Adora POS LLC. makes no express or implied representations or warranties,
            of any kind related to this Website or the materials contained on this Website.
            Additionally, nothing contained on this Website shall be construed as providing consult or advice to you.
Limitation of liability
In no event shall Adora POS LLC., nor any of its officers, directors and employees,
            be liable to you for anything arising out of or in any way connected with your use
            of this Website, whether such liability is under contract, tort or otherwise, and Adora POS LLC.,
            including its officers, directors and employees shall not be liable for any indirect,
            consequential or special liability arising out of or in any way related to your use of this Website.
Indemnification
You hereby indemnify to the fullest extent Adora POS LLC. from and against any and all liabilities,
            costs, demands, causes of action, damages and expenses (including reasonable attorney’s fees)
            arising out of or in any way related to your breach of any of the provisions of these Terms.
Severability
If any provision of these Terms is found to be unenforceable or invalid under any applicable law,
            such unenforceability or invalidity shall not render these Terms unenforceable or invalid as a whole,
            and such provisions shall be deleted without affecting the remaining provisions herein.
Variation of Terms
Adora POS LLC. is permitted to revise these Terms at any time as it sees fit, and by
            using this Website you are expected to review such Terms on a regular basis to ensure you
            understand all terms and conditions governing use of this Website.
Assignment
Adora POS LLC. shall be permitted to assign, transfer, and subcontract its rights and/or
            obligations under these Terms without any notification or consent required. However, .you shall
            not be permitted to assign, transfer, or subcontract any of your rights and/or obligations under these Terms.
Entire Agreement
These Terms, including any legal notices and disclaimers contained on this Website, constitute the entire
            agreement between Adora POS LLC. and you in relation to your use of this Website, and supersede
            all prior agreements and understandings with respect to the same.
Governing Law & Jurisdiction
These Terms will be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of California, and you submit to
            the non-exclusive jurisdiction of the state and federal courts located in California for the resolution of any disputes.
