name: Champa Kitchen
raw_text:
Explore Champa's Menu for Authentic Vietnamese Flavors
We are a Halal Vietnamese restaurant in the Bay Area, offering a diverse selection that you can explore on the Champa Garden Redding menu and the Champa Garden restaurant menu, featuring delicious options from the Champa menu and the Champa Thai menu.
Home
Events
Menu
About Us
More
Home
Events
Menu
About Us
Home
Events
Menu
About Us
Champa Kitchen Menu
Appetizers
Spring Rolls            (2 pieces)
.
Enjoy fresh rice paper wrapped with mint, cilantro, beansprout, carrot, cucumber, noodle, and shrimp, served with peanut sauce on the side, as featured on the Champa Garden Redding menu. This delightful dish is a highlight of the Champa Garden restaurant menu, reflecting the flavors found in the Champa menu and the Champa Thai menu.
Egg Rolls           (deep fried,4 pieces)
.
The Champa Garden Redding menu features delicious options like chicken, taro, carrot, and glass noodle, showcasing the variety in the Champa Garden restaurant menu. For those exploring the Champa menu or the Champa Thai menu, these ingredients highlight the flavors that make the dining experience exceptional.
Shrimp Rolls (deep fried, 6 pieces)
.
Try the delicious shrimp and green onion wrap with lumpia paper, a standout dish on the Champa Garden Redding menu. It perfectly showcases the flavors you can find throughout the Champa Garden restaurant menu, offering a delightful experience that highlights the best of the Champa Thai menu.
Paratha Bread
.
Enjoy the delicious roti paratha served with a special house curry sauce dip, which you can find on the Champa Garden Redding menu. This delightful dish is a highlight of the Champa Garden restaurant menu, showcasing the best of what the Champa Thai menu has to offer.
Mango or Papaya Salad
.
Mango Salad from the Champa Garden Redding menu features fresh ingredients like mango, carrot, green apple, daikon, jalapeno, cilantro, onion, crushed peanuts, and shrimp, all tossed in a special house dressing.
Papaya Salad, also found on the Champa Thai menu, includes green papaya, carrot, tomato, long bean, basil, shrimp, and crushed peanuts, making it a delightful addition to the Champa Garden restaurant menu.
Chicken Wing (deep fried, 6 pieces)
.
glazed with a special house sauce from the Champa Garden Redding menu.
Sandwiches
Enjoy a delicious baguette filled with sweet and sour carrot, daikon, cilantro, cucumber, onion, and jalapeno, all topped with mayo, thousand island sauce, and a special house sauce, as featured on the Champa Garden Redding menu. This delightful offering is just one of many highlights from the Champa Garden restaurant menu, showcasing the best of the Champa menu and Champa Thai menu.
Chicken Sandwich
.
Beef Sandwich
.
Lamb Sandwich
.
Egg Sandwich
.
Rice Plates
Grilled Chicken
.
On the Champa Garden Redding menu, you can find a delicious grilled boneless whole-piece chicken marinated with lemongrass, perfect for those looking to explore the flavors of the Champa Garden restaurant menu. This dish showcases the delightful options available on the Champa menu, especially within the Champa Thai menu.
Champa Lamb
.
The Champa Garden Redding menu features delicious lamb meat marinated with lemongrass, a perfect dish to explore on the Champa Garden restaurant menu. You'll find this flavorful option on the Champa menu, which showcases the best of the Champa Thai menu.
Champa Rendang
.
Indulge in the slow cooked beef with coconut milk and special house spices, a delightful dish featured on the Champa Garden Redding menu. This exquisite offering is a highlight of the Champa Garden restaurant menu, showcasing the flavors that are a staple of the Champa Thai menu.
Grilled Shrimp
.
At Champa Garden in Redding, the menu features a delightful selection of dishes, including delicious shrimps. Whether you're exploring the Champa Garden restaurant menu or diving into the Champa Thai menu, you'll find a variety of shrimp dishes that cater to every palate. Don't miss out on the flavorful offerings from the Champa menu!
Champa Chicken
.
Enjoy sautéed boneless chicken pieces marinated with lemongrass, a delightful dish you can find on the Champa Garden Redding menu, showcasing the best flavors from the Champa Garden restaurant menu and reflecting the essence of the Champa Thai menu.
Shaking Beef "Bo Luc Lac"
.
Enjoy our marinated beef sirloin sautéed with onion, bell pepper, and green onion, all drizzled with our in-house special sauce, featured on the Champa Garden Redding menu, which showcases the best of the Champa Garden restaurant menu and the delightful options available on the Champa Thai menu.
Champa Fish
.
Enjoy the fried marinated tilapia fish with turmeric and lemongrass, glazed with green onion, available on the Champa Garden Redding menu. This dish is a standout on the Champa Garden restaurant menu, showcasing the flavors featured in the Champa Thai menu.
Curries
(Served with a choice of Rice, Bread, or Paratha from the Champa Garden Redding menu, you can enjoy a variety of options available on the Champa Garden restaurant menu, including selections from the Champa menu and the Champa Thai menu.)
Chicken
.
Lamb
.
Fried Rice
On the Champa Garden Redding menu, you can choose from a selection of meats including Chicken and Beef. For those exploring the Champa Thai menu, Lamb or Shrimp can be added for an additional $2.
Lamb Fried Rice
.
Shrimp Fried Rice
.
Chicken Fried Rice
.
Beef Fried Rice
.
Fried Noodle
Choose your meat from the Champa Garden Redding menu—options include Chicken or Beef. For a small additional charge of $2, you can also select Lamb or Shrimp from the Champa Thai menu.
Fried Egg Noodle
.
If you're looking for a delightful dining experience, be sure to check out the Champa Garden restaurant menu. Their offerings include a variety of authentic Thai dishes that cater to all tastes. You can explore the Champa Thai menu to find your favorites, and don’t forget to look at the Champa garden Redding menu for seasonal specials. Whether you’re a fan of classic Thai flavors or curious to try something new, the Champa menu has something for everyone.
Pad Thai
.
Enjoy our delicious chicken fried with tamarind sauce, as featured on the Champa Garden Redding menu. This dish is served with peanuts and chili flakes on the side, making it a perfect addition to the Champa Thai menu at our restaurant.
Fried Clear Noodle
.
If you're looking for a delightful dining experience, be sure to check out the Champa Garden restaurant menu. Their offerings include a variety of authentic Thai dishes that cater to all tastes. You can explore the Champa Thai menu to find your favorites, and don’t forget to look at the Champa garden Redding menu for seasonal specials. Whether you’re a fan of classic Thai flavors or curious to try something new, the Champa menu has something for everyone.
Pho and Noodle Soups
When exploring the options on the Champa Garden Redding menu, you'll find a choice between rice noodles or egg noodles, which are featured prominently on the Champa Thai menu.
Pho Beef "Bo"
.
You can enjoy a delicious dish of sliced eye-round beef with thin rice noodles, featured on the Champa Garden Redding menu. For more delightful options, check out the Champa Garden restaurant menu, which includes a diverse range of choices from the Champa menu, including specialties from the Champa Thai menu.
Pho Chicken "Ga"
.
A slice of chicken served with thin rice noodles is a delightful option you'll find on the Champa Garden Redding menu, showcasing the delicious offerings from the Champa Garden restaurant menu. For those exploring the Champa menu, the thin rice noodle dish is a must-try, especially if you're a fan of the Champa Thai menu.
Beef Stew " Bo Kho"
.
Enjoy tender beef and carrots, a delightful dish featured on the Champa Garden Redding menu. It’s served with noodles, and if you’d like to add bread, it’s just an extra $1. For more delicious options, check out the full Champa Garden restaurant menu or explore the Champa Thai menu.
Spicy Beef Soup "Bun Bo"
.
Indulge in a deep, rich soup featuring eye-round beef and beef brisket, perfectly complemented by vermicelli noodles, as highlighted on the Champa Garden Redding menu. This delightful dish is a must-try from the Champa Garden restaurant menu, showcasing the best of the Champa Thai menu.
Seafood Soup      "Hai San"
.
Vegetable Soup      "Pho Chay"
.
Crab Soup "Bun Rieu"
.
Vermicelli Noodles
Served with carrot, daikon, cucumber, beansprout, cilantro, mint, fish sauce, crushed peanuts, and glazed green onions, this dish is a highlight from the Champa Garden Redding menu, showcasing the vibrant flavors found in the Champa Garden restaurant menu. For those exploring the Champa menu or the Champa Thai menu, this offering perfectly reflects the fresh ingredients and culinary creativity that define our dishes.
Grilled Chicken
.
Please add a description about this item, referring to the Champa Garden Redding menu, which showcases the delightful offerings of the Champa Garden restaurant menu. You can explore the Champa menu to discover a variety of dishes, including selections from the Champa Thai menu.
Grilled Beef
.
Please add a description about this item, referring to the Champa Garden Redding menu, which showcases the delightful offerings of the Champa Garden restaurant menu. You can explore the Champa menu to discover a variety of dishes, including selections from the Champa Thai menu.
Grilled Shrimp
.
Please add a description about this item, referring to the Champa Garden Redding menu, which showcases the delightful offerings of the Champa Garden restaurant menu. You can explore the Champa menu to discover a variety of dishes, including selections from the Champa Thai menu.
Beverages
Thai Tea
.
Hot/Ice tea
.
At Champa Garden Restaurant, you can choose between a refreshing Green Tea or the classic Lipton Tea, as featured on the Champa Garden Redding menu. Explore more options on the Champa menu, including selections from the Champa Thai menu.
Vietnamese Hot/Ice Coffee
.
Soft Drink (Salaam Can Soda)
.
On the Champa Garden Redding menu, you can find a variety of beverages including Cola, Cola Zero Sugar, Yemonade, and Lebanorange. Be sure to check out the Champa Garden restaurant menu for a full selection of drinks and dishes, as well as the Champa menu and Champa Thai menu for unique culinary options.
Ice Lemonade
.

.

.

name: Akira Seabright
raw_text:
Akira Santa Cruz
Home
Restaurant
Menu
Welcome
Home
Restaurant
Menu
Welcome
Sushi. Sake. Beer.
Located in Seabright, Akira Santa Cruz prides itself on its fresh fish combined with bold flavorings. A casual sushi experience mixed with hip vibes and wonderful local art. Please join us at the original Akira Sushi!
Akira Santa Cruz opened it’s doors in February 2012 right in the thick of midtown. Akira prides itself on the quality of its fresh fish! Having an amazing customer base allows us to bring you quality product every day. Come in and let our chefs make you a custom omakase or chirashi donburi for a more tradition taste, or choose from over a hundred roll combinations with bold and magnificent flavorings. Chefs in the kitchen prepare our salmon teriyaki, skirt steak and hamachi kama, all very popular grill items. Come in for lunch and enjoy sushi lunch specials and bento boxes. Akira has happy hour every day! Best deal around! We also specialize in Japanese saké and beer from all over the region. Come in and cheers us at Akira Santa Cruz! Kanpai!

(831) 600-7093

A combination of shredded cabbage, willow tree fungus, and fluffed eggs sauteed in our house soy sauce. This favorite comes with four house made thin pancakes, thinly Julienned scallions and Hoison sauce. Have our Mu Shu prepared simply as above, or add your choice of shredded pork, sliced beef, chicken, or prawn..

Authentic Thai Cuisine In Scotts Valley
Discover the perfect blend of spices and flavors at Kao Sook Thai Cuisine
Order Now
At Kao Sook Thai, weâre passionate about serving the true taste of Thailand.
At Kao Sook Thai, our story began in the bustling streets of Bangkok, where our founder learned the art of Thai cuisine from generations of local chefs. Now rooted in the heart of Scotts Valley, weâre proud to share those same bold, time-honored recipes with our neighbors across the Santa Cruz Mountains.
About Us
Kao Sook Thai Cuisine is an award-winning local Scotts Valley restaurant
We strive to bring the authentic flavors of Thailand to your plate.

Customer Reviews
Check out our most recent reviews!
Jeff Kreer
OMG, Angel wings, where have you been all my life? Deep fried stuffed chicken wings with sweet and sour sauce and pickled veggies and you can pretty much eat the whole thing. It's the best food surprise I've had in a long time!! It's a good serving too, with a little curry rice on the side, it's a meal.
Carmen
Really good Americanized Thai food. The owners are wonderful people. My favorites were the pad tai and coconut shrimp. The fish cakes were also made fresh that day.
Matt D
We were pleasantly surprised with the taste of all five items we ordered (eggplant red curry, chicken noodle soup, fresh rolls, pineapple combo fried rice, and chow mein noodles). The staff was also on their game with keeping us filled with water and happy. We'll be back!
Matt Archer
Customer service is top notch here! Very tasty food, nice people, and the food had great flavor! Highly recommended if your in Scotts Valley ð

DEFINITIONS
The following definitions have the same meaning regardless of whether they appear in singular or plural or in other grammatical forms:

(also referred as "we") refers to SmilePOS LLC, a Washington limited liability company.

means feedback, innovations or suggestions sent by you regarding the attributes, performance or features of our Service.

refer to food, beverages and other items, which are listed on a Merchant’s menu and offered for sale on the Service.

means a restaurant or other business that has signed an agreement or agreements with Smile for Smile’s POS systems and their features and related services.

means a request by you to purchase Products through the Service.

means the terms which set out, on
https://www.smilepos.com/privacy.html
, how Smile will deal with personal information received from you via our websites and/or for the Service.

means a method of your payment, such as your credit or debit card or other permitted payment method, for your Order.

means a transaction of your payment to Merchants for your Order with an eligible Payment Method.

refers to our services available through any websites, including

, Application, digital ordering features, or any other ways Smile allows you to engage with us for your Orders directly or through a Merchant that uses Smile.

If you are an entity, organization, or company, the individual accepting the Terms on your behalf represents and warrants that he or she has the authority to bind you and you agree to be bound by the Terms. You authorize Smile to process your Order through the Payment Method on behalf of the Merchant from which you ordered.

Our Privacy Policy describes our policies and procedures on handling personal information, including without limitation, the collection, use, storage, processing, modification, disclosure, and deletion of your personal information, when you use the Service.  Please read our Privacy Policy carefully before using our Service.
MERCHANTS
Smile provides technology services to Merchants to enable Customers to place Orders, facilitates Orders with Merchants, and processes Payment Transactions on behalf of each Merchant.
Orders and Payment Transactions you make through our Service are transactions between you and the Merchant only, not with Smile or any of our affiliates.  Smile is not the seller of any product or service offered by Merchants and is not a party to any Payment Transaction facilitated through the Service.

USER ACCOUNTS
When you use the Service, you can choose whether you would like to register and create an Account.  If you create an Account, you may save your personal information to make future Orders faster and easier.  You may place Orders without creating an Account, but you will not be able to save any personal information or preferences for future Orders.
When you create an Account, you must provide us information that is accurate, complete, and current at all times.  Failure to do so constitutes a breach of the Terms, which may result in immediate termination of your Account.
You are responsible for safeguarding your login information that you use to access the Service and for any activities or actions under your login information.  You agree not to disclose your login information to any third party.  You must notify us immediately upon becoming aware of any breach of security or unauthorized use of your Account.

Smile does not warrant that the Application will be compatible with your device. PLACING ORDERS FOR PRODUCTS
Your Information

When you make an Order, you authorize Smile, as agent for the Merchant, to submit the charge in the amount of the Order (including any gratuities, fees and taxes) to your Payment Method issuer as well as any credits in connection with chargebacks, reversals, refunds or adjustments. Payments made through the Service are also subject to the terms of your agreement with your Payment Method issuer.  You are solely responsible for any charges or fees that may be imposed by your Payment Method issuer as a result of using the Service.
Order Changes, Cancellation, and Refunds
Merchants each set their own cancellation and refund policies.  Once an Order has been made through the Service, you will need to contact the Merchant directly to inquire if you can make a change to or cancel the Order or whether you may receive a refund.
You authorize Smile to communicate with the Merchant regarding the change or cancellation of your Order.  Reimbursement will be made upon confirmation by Smile that the change or cancellation of your Order can be made.  We will use the same means of payment as you used for the Order.
For questions or customer service regarding an Order or the product or service provided by a Merchant, please contact the Merchant directly.  Smile is not responsible for any Merchant product or service issues or content errors or inaccuracies related to a Merchant’s website, menu, or other materials.
Smile reserves the right to refuse or cancel your Order at any time for certain reasons, including the following:
There is an error in your Order.
Fraud or an unauthorized or illegal transaction is suspected.
Availability, Errors and Inaccuracies
Merchants may update their Products, including their prices, from time to time.  The Products available on our Service may be mispriced, described inaccurately, or unavailable, and we may experience delays in updating information regarding the Products on the Service and other websites.
Smile cannot and do not guarantee the accuracy or completeness of any information of the Products, including their prices, images, specifications and availability, and Merchants’ services.  We reserve the right to change or update information and to correct errors, inaccuracies, or omissions on the Service at any time without prior notice.
Payments
All Products purchased are subject to a one-time payment.  Payment can be made through various payment methods we have available, such as Visa and MasterCard.
Payment cards (credit cards or debit cards) are subject to validation checks and authorization by your card issuer.  If we do not receive the required authorization, we will not be liable for any delay or non-delivery of your Order.
Shipping and Delivery
Product shipping, delivery, and preparation timelines are estimated by each Merchant.  Merchants and their shipping or delivery service providers, where applicable, are responsible for ensuring that appropriate insurance policies are in place for the shipping and delivery of the Products to Customers.  Smile will not be responsible for any damage caused to Products during shipping or delivery or any loss or damage caused in connection with the supply of Products.

Privacy Policy
Last modified: 02/22/2022
Introduction
SmilePOS, LLC ("
Company
" or "
We
") respect your privacy and are committed to protecting it through our compliance with this policy. We provide point of sales systems and related products and services (collectively "
Product
" or "
Products
") that help our restaurant customers better manage their business.
This policy describes the types of information we may collect from you or that you may provide when you visit the websites, Smilepos.com and SmileDining.com (collectively, "
Websites
") or through our Products and our practices for collecting, using, maintaining, protecting, and disclosing that information.
This policy applies to information we collect:
On the Websites.
In email, text, and other electronic messages between you and the Websites.
Through mobile and desktop applications you download from the Websites, which provide dedicated non-browser-based interaction between you and the Websites.
through our Products used or accessed by us or our Product users.
It does not apply to:
information collected by us offline or through any other means not described in this policy;
information collected by any third party, including through any application or content (including advertising) that may link to or be accessible from the Websites or Products; or
Any third-party websites, products, or services (including those of Product users and their vendors) even if they link to our Websites or Products, and we encourage you to review the applicable privacy policy of those third parties to learn how your information will be collected and used.
Please read this policy carefully to understand our policies and practices regarding your information and how we will treat it. If you do not agree with our policies and practices, your choice is not to use our Websites or Products. By accessing or using the Websites or Products, you agree to this privacy policy. This policy may change from time to time (see Changes to Our Privacy Policy). Your continued use of the Websites or Products after we make changes is deemed to be acceptance of those changes, so please check the policy periodically for updates.
Information We Collect About You and How We Collect It
We collect several types of information from and about users of our Websites and Products (including users of our Websites and Products and customers of our Products users), including information:
By which you may be personally identified, such as name, postal address, e-mail address, telephone number (“
Personal Information
”);
About your internet connection, the equipment you use to access our Websites or Products, and usage details.
We collect this information:
Directly from you when you provide it to us.
Automatically as you navigate through the Websites. Information collected automatically may include usage details, IP addresses, and information collected through cookies, web beacons, and other tracking technologies.
From third parties, for example, our business partners.
Information You Provide to Us
The information we collect on or through our Websites and Products may include:
Information that you provide by filling in forms on our Websites or provided by our Product users. This includes information provided at the time of registering to use our Websites or Product user’s merchandise, subscribing to our Products, or requesting further Products. We may also ask you for information when you report a problem with our Websites or Products, including, without limitation:
Records and copies of your correspondence (including email addresses) if you contact us.
Your responses to surveys for research purposes.
Details of transactions you carry out through our Websites or Products and of the fulfillment of your orders. You may be required to provide financial information before placing an order through our Websites or Products.
Your search queries on the Websites.
Information We Collect Through Automatic Data Collection Technologies
As you navigate through and interact with our Websites, we may use automatic data collection technologies to collect certain information about your equipment, browsing actions, and patterns, including:
Details of your visits to our Websites, including traffic data, location data, logs, and other communication data and the resources that you access and use on the Websites.
Information about your computer and internet connection, including your IP address, operating system, and browser type.
The information we collect automatically does not include Personal Information. It helps us to improve our Websites and to deliver a better and more personalized service, including by enabling us to:
Estimate our audience size and usage patterns.
Store information about your preferences, allowing us to customize our Websites according to your individual interests.
Speed up your searches.
Recognize you when you return to our Websites.
The technologies we use for this automatic data collection may include:
Cookies (or browser cookies).
A cookie is a small file placed on the hard drive of your computer. You may refuse to accept browser cookies by activating the appropriate setting on your browser. However, if you select this setting you may be unable to access certain parts of our Websites. Unless you have adjusted your browser setting so that it will refuse cookies, our system will issue cookies when you direct your browser to our Websites.
Flash Cookies.
Certain features of our Websites may use local stored objects (or Flash cookies) to collect and store information about your preferences and navigation to, from, and on our Websites. Flash cookies are not managed by the same browser settings as are used for browser cookies. For information about managing your privacy and security settings for Flash cookies, see Choices About How We Use and Disclose Your Information.
Web Beacons.
Pages of the Websites and our e-mails may contain small electronic files known as web beacons (also referred to as clear gifs, pixel tags, and single-pixel gifs) that permit the Company, for example, to count users who have visited those pages or opened an email and for other related website statistics (for example, recording the popularity of certain website content and verifying system and server integrity).
Children Under the Age of 13
Our Websites or Products are not intended for children under 13 years of age. No one under age 13 may provide any information to the Websites or Products. We do not knowingly collect Personal Information from children under 13. If you are under 13, do not use or provide any information on the Websites or through our Products. If we learn we have collected or received Personal Information from a child under 13 without verification of parental consent, we will delete that information. If you believe we might have any information from or about a child under 13, please contact us at
[email protected]
.
How We Use Your Information
We use information that we collect about you or that you provide to us, including any Personal Information:
To present our Websites and its contents to you.
To provide you with information or Products that you request from us.
To fulfill any other purpose for which you provide it.
To provide you with notices about your account/subscription, including expiration and renewal notices.
To carry out our obligations and enforce our rights arising from any contracts entered between you and us, including for billing and collection.
To notify you about changes to our Websites or any Products we offer or provide though it.
To allow you to participate in interactive features on our Websites.
In any other way we may describe when you provide the information.
For any other purpose with your consent.
We may also use your information to contact you about our Products and third-parties' goods and services that may be of interest to you. If you do not want us to use your information in this way, or if you want to change your information with us, adjust your user preferences or change your information in your account profile, or contact us as stated in Contact Information.  You may also delete your information by clicking the delete button in your account profile or contacting us as stated in Contact Information.  For more information, see Choices About How We Use and Disclose Your Information and Contact Information.
Disclosure of Your Information
We may disclose aggregated information about our users and information that does not identify any individual, without restriction.
We may disclose Personal Information that we collect, or you provide as described in this privacy policy:
To our subsidiaries and affiliates.
To contractors, service providers, and other third parties we use to support our business and who are bound by contractual obligations to keep Personal Information confidential and use it only for the purposes for which we disclose it to them.
To a buyer or other successor in the event of a merger, divestiture, restructuring, reorganization, dissolution, or other sale or transfer of some or all of Company’s assets, whether as a going concern or as part of bankruptcy, liquidation, or similar proceeding, in which Personal Information held by Company about our Websites and Product users is among the assets transferred.
For any other purpose disclosed by us when you provide the information.
With your consent.
We may also disclose your Personal Information:
To comply with any court order, law, or legal process, including to respond to any government or regulatory request.
To enforce or apply our terms of use and other agreements, including for billing and collection purposes.
If we believe disclosure is necessary or appropriate to protect the rights, property, or safety of the Company, our customers, or others. This includes exchanging information with other companies and organizations for the purposes of fraud protection and credit risk reduction.
Choices About How We Use and Disclose Your Information
We strive to provide you with choices regarding the Personal Information you provide to us. We have created mechanisms to provide you with the following control over your information:
Tracking Technologies and Advertising.
You can set your browser to refuse all or some browser cookies, or to alert you when cookies are being sent. To learn how you can manage your Flash cookie settings, visit the Flash player settings page on Adobe's website. If you disable or refuse cookies, please note that some parts of this site may then be inaccessible or not function properly.
Data Security
Unfortunately, the transmission of information via the internet is not completely secure. Although we do our best to protect your Personal Information, we cannot guarantee the security of your Personal Information transmitted to our Websites or through our Products. Any transmission of Personal Information is at your own risk. We are not responsible for circumvention of any privacy settings or security measures contained on the Websites or the Products.
Changes to Our Privacy Policy
It is our policy to post any changes we make to our privacy policy on this page. If we make material changes to how we treat our users' Personal Information, we will notify you by email to the email address specified in your account or through a notice on the Websites. The date the privacy policy was last revised is identified at the top of the page. You are responsible for ensuring we have an up- to-date active and deliverable email address for you, and for periodically visiting our Websites and this privacy policy to check for any changes.
Contact Information
To ask questions or comment about this privacy policy and our privacy practices, contact us at:
SmilePOS, LLC, PO Box 2653, Lynnwood, WA 98036 or
[email protected]
.
Accessibility Statement
SmilePOS LLC (“SmilePOS,” “we,” “our,” or “us”) is committed to ensuring digital accessibility for people with disabilities.  We are continually improving the user experience for everyone, and applying the relevant accessibility standards.
Measures to Support Accessibility
SmilePOS takes the following measures to ensure accessibility of Smile Dining website:
Incorporate accessibility considerations into our digital resource design process.
Ensures accessibility is part of our continuous improvement process.
Follow reasonable technical practices for digital accessibility.
Conformance Status
The Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG)
defines requirements for designers and developers to improve accessibility for people with disabilities.  It defines three levels of conformance: Level A, Level AA, and Level AAA.  Smile Dining website is conformant with WCAG 2.0 level AA and partially conformant with WCAG 2.1 level AA.   Partially conformant means that some parts of the content do not fully conform to the accessibility standard.
Feedback
We welcome your feedback on the accessibility of Smile Dining website.  Please let us know if you encounter accessibility barriers:
Phone: (206) 905-9025
E-mail:
[email protected]
Compatibility with Browsers and Assistive Technology
Smile Dining website is designed to be compatible with assistive technologies and the last two versions of major browsers, including Chrome, Microsoft Edge, Safari, and Firefox.
In Internet Explorer 10, 11, and older browsers, some aspects of the website may not display optimally.  Smile Dining website is not designed for Internet Explorer 9 and earlier versions.
Technical Specifications
Accessibility of Smile Dining website relies on the following technologies to work with the particular combination of web browser and any assistive technologies or plugins installed on your computer:
HTML
CSS
JavaScript
SVG
These technologies are relied upon for conformance with the accessibility standards used.
Limitations and Alternatives
Despite our best efforts to ensure accessibility of Smile Dining website, there may be some limitations.  Please contact us as described in “Feedback” above if you encounter any issues in accessing our website.
Assessment Approach
SmilePOS assessed the accessibility of Smile Dining website by self-evaluation.
Formal complaints
If you wish to send us a formal complaint regarding accessibility accommodations of this website, please contact us as described in “Feedback” above.
Formal Approval of this Accessibility Statement
This Accessibility Statement is approved by:
SmilePOS LLC

PRIVACY STATEMENT
SECTION 1 - WHAT DO WE DO WITH YOUR INFORMATION?
When you purchase something from our store, as part of the buying and selling process, we collect the personal information you give us such as your name, address and email address.
        When you browse our store, we also automatically receive your computer’s internet protocol (IP) address in order to provide us with information that
        helps us learn about your browser and operating system.
        Email marketing (if applicable): With your permission, we may send you emails about our store, new products and other updates.
SECTION 2 - CONSENT
How do you get my consent?
When you provide us with personal information to complete a transaction, verify your credit card, place an order, arrange for a delivery or return a
        purchase, we imply that you consent to our collecting it and using it for that specific reason only.
        If we ask for your personal information for a secondary reason, like marketing, we will either ask you directly for your expressed consent, or provide
        you with an opportunity to say no.
        If after you opt-in, you change your mind, you may withdraw your consent for us to contact you, for the continued collection, use or disclosure of your
        ontinued collection, use or disclosure of your information, at anytime, by contacting us at
[email protected]
SECTION 3 - DISCLOSURE
We may disclose your personal information if we are required by law to do so or if you violate our Terms of Service.
SECTION 4 – Smile POS
Our store is hosted on Smile POS, LLC. They provide us with the online e-commerce platform that allows us to sell our products and services to you.
        Your data is stored through Smile POS’ data storage, databases and the general Smile POS application. They store your data on a secure server behind a firewall.

        Payment:

        Smile POS stores your credit card data. It is encrypted through the Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI-DSS). Your purchase transaction data is stored only as long as is necessary to complete your purchase transaction. After that is complete, your purchase transaction information is deleted.
        All direct payment gateways adhere to the standards set by PCI-DSS as managed by the PCI Security Standards Council, which is a joint effort of brands like Visa, MasterCard, American Express and Discover.
        PCI-DSS requirements help ensure the secure handling of credit card information by our store and its service providers
SECTION 5 - THIRD-PARTY SERVICES
In general, the third-party providers used by us will only collect, use and disclose your information to the extent necessary to allow them to perform the services they provide to us.
        However, certain third-party service providers, such as payment gateways and other payment transaction processors, have their own privacy policies in respect to the information we are required to provide to them for your purchase-related transactions.
        For these providers, we recommend that you read their privacy policies so you can understand the manner in which your personal information will be handled by these providers.
        In particular, remember that certain providers may be located in or have facilities that are located a different jurisdiction than either you or us. So if you elect to proceed with a transaction that involves the services of a third-party service provider, then your information may become subject to the laws of the jurisdiction(s) in which that service provider or its facilities are located.
        As an example, if you are located in Canada and your transaction is processed by a payment gateway located in the United States, then your personal information used in completing that transaction may be subject to disclosure under United States legislation, including the Patriot Act.
        Once you leave our store’s website or are redirected to a third-party website or application, you are no longer governed by this Privacy Policy or our website’s Terms of Service.
Links:
        When you click on links on our store, they may direct you away from our site. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of other sites and encourage you to read their privacy statements.
SECTION 6 - SECURITY
To protect your personal information, we take reasonable precautions and follow industry best practices to make sure it is not inappropriately lost, misused, accessed, disclosed, altered or destroyed.
        If you provide us with your credit card information, the information is encrypted using secure socket layer technology (SSL) and stored with a AES-256 encryption. Although no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, we follow all PCI-DSS requirements and implement additional generally accepted industry standards.
SECTION 7 - AGE OF CONSENT
By using this site, you represent that you are at least the age of majority in your state or province of residence, or that you are the age of majority in your state or province of residence and you have given us your consent to allow any of your minor dependents to use this site.
SECTION 8 - CHANGES TO THIS PRIVACY POLICY
We reserve the right to modify this privacy policy at any time, so please review it frequently. Changes and clarifications will take effect immediately upon their posting on the website. If we make material changes to this policy, we will notify you here that it has been updated, so that you are aware of what information we collect, how we use it, and under what circumstances, if any, we use and/or disclose it.
        If our store is acquired or merged with another company, your information may be transferred to the new owners so that we may continue to sell products to you.
QUESTIONS AND CONTACT INFORMATION
If you would like to: access, correct, amend or delete any personal information we have about you, register a complaint, or simply want more information contact our Privacy Compliance Officer at
[email protected]
Last updated on 15 March 2017

About Coconut Thai Cuisine
Welcome to Coconut Thai Cuisine
We are located in Brown Ranch shopping center,Capitola,CA
We began in 2025 as a partnership of four passionate Thai food specialists,each with over 15 years of experience working in Thai restaurants Our goal is to deliver an authentic Thai dining experience in every dish which prepared with care, using traditional recipes and fresh ingredients just like how we cook for our own families.
Beyond The Boundaries of Taste
We donât just serve food-we share a piece of Thailand, every dish is crafted with heart, rooted in tradition, and meant to make you feel at home. One experience Thai cuisine that goes beyond flavor.....

Poké House Menu
Poke House’s menu encapsulates what we firmly believe in: serving
fresh
food that is both
sustainable
and
delicious
! Our fish is sustainably sourced and our produce is delivered fresh daily from local suppliers whenever possible. First time here? Try one of our signature poké bowls. Already know what you like? Build your own perfect bowl with our wide selection of fresh ingredients, flavorful toppings, and house-made sauces like our citrus ponzu.
View Our Menu
Order Now
Signature Bowls
House Salmon
A Poké House favorite since day one! Combines melt-in-your mouth Scottish salmon with a mix of masago, edamame, cucumber, white and green onions, furikake, citrus ponzu and our house-made sriracha aioli for a mild kick. Served over rice or salad with seaweed salad and krab salad.
Tuna Lover
Craving tuna? This tuna packed bowl combines our three tuna offerings—ahi tuna, spicy tuna, and garlic oyster tuna—to satisfy your cravings. Includes cucumber, white and green onions, masago, and furikake with a blend of sesame oil, house shoyu and citrus ponzu sauce. Served over rice or salad with seaweed salad and krab salad.
Miso Salmon
A sweet and savory salmon bowl featuring our fresh Scottish salmon combined with grape tomatoes, edamame, cucumber, white and green onions, hijiki seaweed, and masago over rice or salad. Mixed with a blend of sesame oil and house shoyu, topped with furikake. Served with krab salad and seaweed salad.
Crispy Shoyu Chicken
Not feeling fishy? We got you covered. Our delicious oven-baked crispy shoyu chicken is here for those who want that Poké House love but in a cooked dish. Drizzled with our Sriracha Aioli and Sweet Unagi for that sweet and spicy kick. Take a bite and hear that crunch!
Roasted Miso Chicken
Our delicious chicken but roasted! Topped with our Miso Aioli, this is a no question, no fuss deliciously healthy bowl. Protein packed and ready to get you going!
Kid's Krab Bowl
For our younger customers who want some Poké House love! Served with two scoops of our krab salad, seaweed salad, and sliced avocado. Drizzled on top with our Sweet Unagi and Furikake. Healthy and light, this bowl will surely not disappoint!
No add-ons please
Build Your Perfect Bowl!
Step 1. Size
4. Mix-Ins
2. Base
5. Sauces
3. Protein
6. Toppings
Dive Deeper Into our Menu
Sauces
Sriracha Aioli
The perfect, creamy balance of sriracha and mayo. A Poke House staple!
Gluten Free
Citrus Ponzu
Our special blend of citrus soy sauce. Light and tangy with notes of orange and lemon.
Sweet Unagi
Our homemade sweet, savory, and rich sauce. Goes great by itself or if you want that sweet kick!
Vegan
Wasabi Vinaigrette
A mustard-based vinaigrette sauce with a strong taste of wasabi! Aromatic, fresh, and sweet with some spice, this sauce is best served with veggies and mixed greens!
Vegan
Contains less than .5% alcohol.
Miso Aioli
Creamy and savory. This toasty and rich sauce will surely leave you wanting more!
Gluten-Free
House Shoyu
A deep flavor of soy sauce and sesame oil. If you want a more traditional taste, this sauce is for you!
Vegan
Sesame Oil
Light, smooth, and nutty taste. This aroma enhancer goes great with any of our sauce or on its own!
Vegan, Gluten-Free, Soy-Free
House Chili
Poke House’s spiciest sauce! Our special blend of spicy chili and chili oil. A must have for spicy lovers!
Handrolls
Shoyu Salmon
Our premium melt-in-your mouth Scottish salmon rolled with house shoyu, cucumbers, furikake and masago for a fresh bite!
Spicy Tuna
Our popular spicy tuna rolled with cucumber and furikake.
California
A classic made the Poké House way! Creamy krab salad rolled with cucumber, avocado, and sesame seeds.
Spam Musubi
Our version of the classic Hawaiian snack. Includes seared Spam rolled with cucumber, furikake and unagi sauce into a savory hand roll.
Hot Items
Salmon Ochazuke
This heartwarming Japanese staple is a light offering featuring miso soup poured over rice topped with salmon. Finished with edamame, furikake and green onions.
Tofu Ochazuke
This heartwarming Japanese staple is a light offering featuring miso soup poured over rice topped with tofu. Finished with edamame, furikake and green onions.
Miso Soup
Our made-to-order classic miso soup includes fresh tofu, green onions and seaweed.

Visit & Connect

1010 Pacific Ave, Santa Cruz, CA
Open Maps
ONLINE
Order for Pickup
Gift Cards
FOLLOW US ON INSTAGRAM @MARIPOSA_COFFEEBAR
Chelsea & Tram
THE TWO OF US
Mariposa opened last fall, but the idea began percolating years earlier. Cabrera grew up in Miami and dreamed of starting a vegan Cuban food truck before pursuing a nursing career that eventually brought her to Santa Cruz. Vu, a native of San Jose, dove into the food industry at age 15. She eventually moved to Santa Cruz and opened The Sandwich Spot in the space that eight years later would become Mariposa.
“Growing up, I drank a lot of Vietnamese coffee, but I always heard that Cuban coffee was the strongest, so when I met Chelsea, I had to try it,” says Vu. “We would go camping and Chelsea would make the coffee, and I would wake up to the smell of espresso in the air. That’s when we realized this was something special and the idea was born. Let’s put two of the strongest coffees together under the same roof.”
Story by
Ashley Drew Owen
, the full article can be found at Edible Monterey Bay. Photo credit: Geniva Rico
Copyright 2022, Mariposa LLC. 1010 Pacific Ave, Santa Cruz, CA.

Important Note :
At McDonald's, we take great care to serve quality, great-tasting menu items to our customers each and every time they visit our restaurants. We understand that each of our customers has individual needs and considerations when choosing a place to eat or drink outside their home, especially those customers with food allergies. As part of our commitment to you, we provide the most current ingredient information available from our food suppliers for the nine most common allergens as identified by the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (eggs, dairy, wheat, soy, peanuts, tree nuts, fish, shellfish and sesame), so that our guests with food allergies can make informed food selections. However, we also want you to know that despite taking precautions, normal kitchen operations may involve some shared cooking and preparation areas, equipment and utensils, and the possibility exists for your food items to come in contact with other food products, including allergens. We encourage our customers with food allergies or special dietary needs to visit www.mcdonalds.com for ingredient information, and to consult their doctor for questions regarding their diet. If you have questions about our food, please reach out to us directly using our
contact us forms
.
Percent Daily Values (DV) and RDIs are based on unrounded values.
**
Percent Daily Values (DV) are based on a 2,000 calorie diet. Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs.
The nutrition information on this website is derived from testing conducted in accredited laboratories, published resources, or from information provided from McDonald's suppliers. The nutrition information is based on standard product formulations and serving sizes.  Calories for fountain beverages are based on standard fill levels plus ice. If you use the self-service fountain inside the restaurant for your drink order, see the sign posted at the beverage fountain for beverage calories without ice. All nutrition information is based on average values for ingredients and is rounded in accordance with current U.S. FDA NLEA regulations. Variation in serving sizes, preparation techniques, product testing and sources of supply, as well as regional and seasonal differences may affect the nutrition values for each product. In addition, product formulations change periodically. You should expect some variation in the nutrient content of the products purchased in our restaurants. Beverage sizes may vary in your market. McDonald’s USA does not certify or claim any of its US menu items as Halal, Kosher or meeting any other religious requirements. We do not promote any of our US menu items as vegetarian, vegan or gluten-free. This information is correct as of January 2022, unless stated otherwise.

raw_text:
Menu | Persian Kabobs
top of page
HOME
MENU
ORDER ONLINE
ABOUT
CONTACT
ORDER NOW
Log In
Menu
APPETIZERS
Kashk Bademjoon
Fire-roasted eggplant mashed with rich kashk (fermented
whey), garnished with crispy fried onions, garlic, and fresh
mint. Smoky, tangy, and irresistible
$12.99
Hummus
A creamy purée of chickpeas, tahini, fresh lemon juice, and
garlic, drizzled with olive oil. Served with warm pita for the
ultimate dip experience
$10.99
Baba Ghanoush
Smoky roasted eggplant blended with tahini, lemon juice,
and garlic, topped with olive oil. A creamy and flavorful
Mediterranean classic.
$10.99
Crispy rice (Tahdig) with
Gorme Sabzi
Crispy tahdig topped with aromatic ghormeh sabzi,
featuring slow-cooked herbs, kidney beans, dried lime, and
tender chunks of beef. A savory blend of flavors and
textures.
$15.99
Crispy rice (Tahdig) with Gheyme
Crispy tahdig served with hearty gheymeh, a flavorful stew
of yellow split peas, tender beef, and dried lime, finished
with a touch of saffron.
$15.99
Crispy rice (Tahdig)
Golden, crispy rice with a signature crunch, perfected with
saffron. A classic Persian delight that's both simple and
unforgettable.
$10.99
Bread cheese and walnuts نان، پنیر و گردو
Fresh artisan bread paired with creamy cheese and walnuts. Simple, rustic, and satisfying.
$9.99
Mix Crispy Rice (Tahdig) with Ghormeh Sabzi and Gheimeh ته دیگ با قورمه سبزی و قیمه
Golden, crispy tahdig topped with aromatic Ghormeh Sabzi—a fragrant stew of slow-cooked herbs, kidney beans, dried limes, and tender beef—paired with rich, hearty Gheimeh, made with split peas, tomato, and spiced beef. A savory medley of textures and traditional Persian flavors.
$19.99
BLOUNT BAKED POTATO SOUP
We’ve taken a delicious baked potato loaded with all the fixin’s and turned it into a hearty soup by blending potatoes with light butter & cream, uncured bacon, chives, dried mint and a touch of spice. It comes with lavash bread.
$7.99
BBQ PLATES & SAFFRON RICE
Chelo Chicken Koobideh
Two skewers of ground chicken koobideh seasoned with
aromatic spices and grilled to tenderness. Served with
saffron rice, a smoky BBQ tomato, fresh mint, and white
onion slices.
$23.99
Chelo Kabob Koobideh
Two skewers of juicy, seasoned ground beef koobideh
kebab, grilled to perfection and sprinkled with sumac.
Served with saffron rice, a smoky BBQ tomato, fresh mint,
and white onion slices.
$22.99
Chelo Chicken Breast (Boneless)
Five pieces of marinated boneless chicken breast grilled to juicy perfection. Served with saffron rice & butter, a smoky
BBQ tomato, fresh parsley, and white onion slices.
$22.99
Chelo Chicken Thigh
(Boneless)
A skewer of tender, marinated boneless chicken thighs,
infused with saffron, spices, and lemon juice & butter.
Served with saffron rice, a smoky BBQ tomato, fresh mint,
and white onion slices.
$21.99
Chelo Combination Koobideh
& Chicken Koobideh
One skewer of seasoned ground beef koobideh paired with
one skewer of marinated chicken koobideh. Served with
saffron rice & butter, a smoky BBQ tomato, fresh mint, and
white onion slices.
$23.99
Chelo Whole Cornish Hen (With Bone)
A whole Cornish hen marinated with saffron, lemon juice, and
spices, grilled to juicy perfection. Served with saffron rice &
butter, a smoky BBQ tomato, fresh mint, and white onion
slices.
$29.99
Chelo Kabob Soltani with Mixed Veggies چلو کباب سلطانی و مخلوط سبزیجات کبابی
A luxurious platter of one skewer of koobideh and one skewer of filet mignon barg, served with saffron rice, butter and a fresh mixed veggie.
$39.99
Queen Chicken and Koobideh (2 People) خوراک کباب کوبیده و کوبیدهجوجه (ملکه)
A royal platter featuring a juicy chicken breast, one skewer of koobideh (ground beef), one skewer of chicken koobideh & butter, and two grilled tomato halves. Served with fresh herbs
and perfect for sharing.
$36.99
Chelo Shish Kabob (Beef) شیش کباب
Skewered filet Beef marinated in Persian spices and grilled to perfection. Served with saffron rice & butter, a smoky BBQ tomato, fresh mint, and white onion slices.
$29.50
Family Mix Kabobs #1(7 Skewers) سینی مخلوط کباب
Delightful selection of our finest kebabs, perfect for sharing with family and friends. Includes:
1 X Skewer Shish Kebob (Beef)
2 X Skewers Koobideh (Beef)
1 X Skewer Chicken Thigh (Boneless)
1 X Skewer Steak Filet Mignon (Barg)
1 X Whole Cornish Hen (With Bones)
1 X Skewer Chicken Breast (Boneless)
2 X Tomatoes
$139.99
Chelo Rack of lamb Chop چلوکباب شیشلیک
Four tender lamb chops marinated with Persian spices and grilled to perfection & butter. Served with saffron rice a smoky BBQ tomato, fresh parsley, and white onion slices.
$38.99
Chelo Barg Kabob چلوکباب برگ
Tender filet mignon marinated in aromatic spices, grilled to perfection, and served with saffron rice & butter, a smoky BBQ tomato, fresh mint, and white onion slices.
$33.99
Chelo Salmon Fish with Saffron Rice and Mixed Veggies چلوماهی سالمون با برنج زعفرانی ومخلوط سبزیجات کبابی
Grilled salmon fillet served over saffron-infused rice & butter, paired with fresh mint, and white onion slices. A harmonious blend of Persian flavors.
$29.99
BBQ Combo Kabob Plate #2 چلو کباب وزیری کوبیده و جوجه با مخلوطسبزیجات کبابی
One skewer of ground beef koobideh and one skewer of chicken breast. Served with saffron rice & butter, a fresh chopped salad, and smoky BBQ vegetables, including a tomato and crispy potato chips.

Persian Dish Kabobs #21 بشقاب ویژه پرشین کباب

selection of fresh greens.

One skewer of juicy ground beef koobideh, grilled to perfection and served with saffron rice & butter, a smoky BBQ tomato, and fresh herbs.
$17.99

Raw Onion

PERSIAN FOODS & STEW
Zereshk Polo Morgh
A classic Persian dish featuring tender chicken (2 whole chicken legs) with chicken broth, fragrant saffron rice, butter and tart barberries. Served with fresh mint and traditional lavash bread for a perfect balance of flavors.
$27.99
Loobiya Polo
A traditional Persian green bean rice dish that combines perfectly cooked rice with tender green beans and aromatic spices.
$21.99
Ghormeh Sabzi with Saffron Rice
A signature Iranian dish, this herb stew combines kidney beans, onions, and black lime with turmeric-seasoned lamb or beef. Served with fragrant saffron rice for a hearty, authentic meal.
$19.99
Gheimeh with Saffron Rice
A rich Persian stew featuring tender beef, yellow split peas, and tangy tomato, topped with crispy fried potatoes. Paired with saffron-infused basmati rice.
$19.99
Gheimeh Bademjoon with Rice
Tender beef, yellow split peas, and aromatic spices simmered in a tangy tomato base, topped with fried eggplants and crispy potatoes, served over saffron-infused basmati rice.
$21.99
Baghali Polo with Salmon

$32.99
Baghali Polo with Lamb Shank

$28.99
VEGETARIAN DISHES
Vegetarian Ghormeh Sabzi Stew with saffron rice
Also known as Khoresht Sabzi, this beloved Iranian herb stew is considered the national dish of Iran. Our vegetarian version features a savory mix of kidney beans, ripe tomatoes, yellow or red onions, and black lime, enhanced with a blend of aromatic spices.
$20.99
Vegetarian Gheimeh Stew with saffron rice
Yellow split peas simmered with tangy tomato and spices. Served with crispy potatoes and saffron rice for a hearty vegetarian dish.
$20.99
Felafel Dish

$18.99
Felafel wrap

$14.99
Felafel (3 Big Pieces)

$11.50
BBQ PER SKEWER
Kabob Beef Koobideh

BBQ chicken, fragrant saffron rice, crispy fried potatoes,

Persian flavors in every bite!

Felafel Sandwich

$14.99
SALADS & SIDES
Salad Shirazi
A refreshing Persian salad featuring diced cucumbers, tomatoes, and onions, seasoned with lemon juice and mint.
A crisp and tangy side!

Season Salad

Shallot Yogurt
Creamy yogurt blended with finely chopped shallots and aromatic herbs. A tangy dip or side to complement grilled meats.

Yogurt with Cucumber
Persian yogurt mixed with finely diced cucumbers, mint, and dill. Served chilled for a refreshing, cooling touch.

Lavash Bread

Fragrant basmati rice infused with aromatic saffron for a rich flavor and beautiful golden hue. A classic side for any Persian meal!

BOOK NOW
A boutique hotel for adult travelers looking for a unique experience steps away from the beach in Monterey, CA.
Offering breakfast in our elegant lobby dining room and dinner / drinks on our scenic rooftop.
LindaRose Bar & Grill's rooftop location features scenic views of Monterey Bay and offers a wide range of craft cocktails, spirits, and locally sourced wine and beer.  Transport yourself to the Mediterranean Coast with our unique selection of fresh, delicious dishes that are freshly made to order, sourced locally, and prepared in-house.
​
Whether you’re in the mood for a quick bite, a romantic dinner for two, or a full night of fun, we invite you to enjoy a respite from reality in our one-of-a-kind rooftop venue. Adults only (ages 18+).

The Menu
We have created a menu of dishes using the finest seasonal produce and beloved traditional Mediterannean recipes. These dishes are prepared on site every day, and paired with ingredients so good they really speak for themselves.
Decide if you want a freshly baked pita or lavash, a salad or a rice plate as the foundation of your meal. Choose meat or vegetarian and your favorite sauce. Add a side or three and of course, remember to leave room for dessert.

About the Business
Shawarmaji is the Bay Area's only Jordanian restaurant that brings Shawarma from the streets of Amman to California. This family-run establishment located in Uptown Oakland and Santa Clara honors the unique flavors of Amman’s most popular street food with its simplicity, and offers people from all walks of life to feel at home with its traditional Arab hospitality.
…
Read more

Q:
Does your Shawarma contain sesame/tahini?
A:
No our chicken shawarma does not contain sesame or tahini. 

our lamb sandwich has tahini sauce, but the meat itself does not.
Mohammad A., Business Owner

The Falafel Souvlaki
$11.00
Get fired up vegetarian-style! This great-tasting Mediterranean souvlaki alternative will satisfy all appetites. This Falafel ball souvlaki is served with tomatoes, lettuce, onions, cucumbers and tzatziki sauce wrapped in handmade pita bread.
The Vegetarian Souvlaki
$12.00
Get fired up vegetarian-style! This great-tasting Mediterranean souvlaki will satisfy all appetites. This souvlaki skewer  is made up of grilled mushrooms, red and green bell peppers, zucchini and served with tomatoes, lettuce, red onions,  feta and tzatziki sauce wrapped in handmade pita bread.
Plates
3 Piece Plate
$22.00
Your choice of meat: chicken, pork, bifteki, or gyro (served with a pita, tomatoes, red onions, fries and tzatziki).
Lamb or Beef Plate
$24.00
Your choice of meat: 2 lamb skewers or 2 beef skewers (served with a pita, tomatoes, red onions, fries and tzatziki).
Special Plate
$18.00
Your choice of meat: pork, chicken, bifteki, gyro or veggie, served with rice, green salad, and a pita | For Beef +$2.00 | For Lamb +$5.00
Souvlaki Gyro Fries
$13.50
Your choice of Gyro meat , or falafel over fries topped with our homemade hot sauce and feta cheese
Souvlaki Bowl
$13.50
Your choice of Gyro meat ,Falafel, or Any skewer over a bed of rice,lettuce ,tomato, and onions, topped with tzatziki,our homemade hot sauce and feta cheese
Soup & Salads
Horiatiki (The Traditional Greek Salad)
$11.00
Crisp and fresh, this Greek salad is combination of ripe Roma tomatoes, crisp green peppers and cucumbers, sweet red onion, Kalamata olives, topped with feta cheese, and seasoned with Greek herbs and olive oil.
Green Salad
$11.00
Embodying the spirit of the traditional Horiatiki, this salad has romaine. It’s a formulation of hearts of romaine, Roma Tomatoes, crisp green peppers, cucumbers, sweet red onion, Kalamata olives, topped with feta cheese, and tossed with our house dressing.
Gyro Salad
$15.00
Hearts of romaine lettuce. Roma tomatoes, cucumbers, red onions, Kalamata olives, feta tossed with our special dressing and your choice of gyro meat, pork, chicken, or lamb/beef.
Green Lemon Soup
$6.50
Warm your inner-most self with this delightful soup. Chunks of free-range chicken and orzo pasta simmered in a rich egg-lemon broth.
Fakies (Lentils) Soup
$6.50
Fakies Soupa is a Greek lentil soup is incredibly hearty and flavorful, is sure to warm you up on a cool winter night. Lentils, onions, garlic, bay leaves, olive oil, and red wine vinegar are all you really need to create a hearty, flavorful, and quite satisfying soup.
Souvlaki Salad
$15.00
Hearts of romaine lettuce. Roma tomatoes, cucumbers, red onions, Kalamata olives, feta tossed with our special dressing and your choice of any skewer (chicken,pork, bifteki,veggie, lamb ,beef) or falafel
For Lamb skewer and beef skewer add $3.00
Side Orders
Fries
$5.50
Fresh hand-cut Kennebec potatoes deep-fried in canola oil, lightly seasoned with Greek seasoning.
Feta Fries
$6.50
Hand cut Kennebec potatoes fried in natural canola oil. Lightly seasoned with Greek herbs and feta.
Spicy Greek Feta
$7.00
Feta cheese, roasted hot red peppers, garlic and spices blended together to create a delicious balance between spicy and tangy; served with two pites.
Tzatziki
$7.00
The most famous Greek cucumber yogurt sauce, served with two pites.
Hummus
$7.00
Spread made of chickpeas and our home blend of spices served with two pites.
Calamari
$16.00
Lightly breaded and seasoned with Greek herbs, finished with a squeeze of lemon juice.
Spanakopita
$8.00
This is a delicious traditional savory spinach pastry. A combination of spinach, feta cheese, Greek herbs and spices, blended together and baked in phyllo pastry.
Tyropita
$8.00
A Greek layered savory pastry, made of layers of buttered phyllo and packed with a warm cheese-egg filling.
Loukaniko
$6.75
Pork sausage seasoned with goodness, accompanied with pita.
Appetizer Special
$13.00
Hummus, tzatziki, melitzanosalata, and spicy feta. Served with two pites.
Rice

Sauted rice pilaf.
Zucchini Fries
$7.00
Hand sliced and deep fried zucchini.
Falafel Balls
$7.00
Serving of 6 falafel balls.

$9.00
Grilled cheese with a touch of lemon juice.
Served with one pita bread
Melitzanosalata
$7.00
Traditional  Greek eggplant salad made with fire roasted eggplants , garlic , extra virgin olive oil herbs and spices

Greek Specialties

Commonly known as a Greek casserole, this full-flavored dish is composed of layers of eggplant, ground beef and potatoes, topped with a cheese-béchamel sauce.
Pastitsio
$18.00
This is the signature Mediterranean pasta dish; layered pasta and ground beef topped with a cheese-béchamel sauce.

Grape leaves stuffed with Greek-seasoned ground beef and topped with egg-lemon sauce, this delicacy is a savory experience with a slight tang.
Dolmades Yialanzi

Grape leaves stuffed with Greek-seasoned rice and topped with olive oil and lemon, this delicacy is a refreshing experience with a slight tang.

MENU
Dio Deka - Fine Hellenic Cuisine
Spring Season
Our menu items are inspired from traditional recipes gathered throughout our travels, personal experiences and our own upbringings, yet elevated with our chefs cooking techniques. Our goal is to create an unforgettable experience and to help shape your own pleasant memories.
A warm welcome & Kali Orexi
Latest Dinner Menu (.pdf)
Dio Deka - Fine Hellenic Cuisine
Starter Plates
MADE IN-HOUSE PITA
Mesquite grilled & oven-baked flatbread, extra virgin olive oil, rigani
LAGANA warm focaccia bread
zucchini, caramelized onions, Attiki honey-butter, Aleppo, maldon
FETA & OLIVES
baked Dodoni feta, warm assorted marinated olives, herbs
TZATZIKI
made in-house sheep's milk yogurt spread, garlic, cucumber, dill, made in-house pita
TIRO-KAFTERI
Dodoni feta, roasted chili spread, served with our made in-house pita
KOLOKITHO-KEFTEDES
crispy zucchini croquettes, feta, herbed yiaourti
SPANAKO-TIRÒPITA
crispy phyllo, spinach & leeks pastries, imported feta & Graviera
GARIDES SANTORINI
sautéed shrimp, feta, tomatoes, orange zest, garlic, onion, Ouzo
MELITZANOSALATA
Mesquite-grilled eggplant, tomato, onion, mint, sliced cucumber
SILLOGI
traditional Greek assortment of spreads, served with made in-house pita
SAGANAKI
oven-baked, imported phyllo-wrapped feta, thyme honey, toasted sesame
OKTAPODI
Galicia coast of Spain, mesquite-grilled octopus, skordolado, Greek oregano
HTÉNIA SCAMPI
two North Atlantic, wild seared scallops, yogurt pomme-purée, lemon-garlic
SASHIMI

SOUTZOUKAKIA
oven-baked lamb and beef meatballs, blistered tomatoes, citrus Greek yogurt
PLEVRAKIA
slow-roasted, Duroc pork riblets, Attiki honey gastrique, lime, mint
“CANOE CUT”
pasture raised, USDA Prime, Allen Bros. roasted beef marrow bones, crusty bread
Dio Deka - Fine Hellenic Cuisine
Second Course
GAZPACHO
tomato-based, chilled watermelon soup, cucumber, red pepper, onion, feta, sesame
HORIATIKI “VILLAGE”
local tomatoes & cucumber salad, red onion, peppers, Dodoni feta, Kalamata olives
TWIST ON GREENS
baby gems, arugula & seasonal vegetables garden salad, hazelnuts, smoked allium
SALAD ENHANCEMENTS
“souvlaki” chicken skewer or New Zealand Ōra King Salmon
Dio Deka - Fine Hellenic Cuisine
The Entrées
Dorade & Branzino are sustainably managed and sourced to us directly from Greece. All filleted fish maintain the chance of pin-bone segments remaining from our in-house fabrication.
MERLUZA NEGRA
seared Chilean Sea Bass, arugula, watermelon, feta, scallions, pomegranate, walnuts
SOLOMOS
roasted New Zealand Ōra King salmon, green lentils, arugula, pesto, herbal lado-lemono
HTÉNIA
North Atlantic large wild seared scallops, creamy polenta, bacon jam, pine nuts, herb-onion salad
LOBSTER PASTA
butter-poached lobster, fettuccine made in-house, Assyrtiko beurre blanc, sweet herbs
RATATOUILLE PASTA
made in-house veggie fettuccine, zucchini, peppers, tomatoes, onion, basil
EMBER-ROASTED FISH & MEATS
“The only time to eat diet food is while you are waiting for a steak to cook” Julia Child – American Chef, Author
TSIPOURA
mesquite-grilled whole fish Dorade served with the bone, lemon, fennel, thimari
LAVRAKI
mesquite-grilled filleted Branzino, Swiss chard, roasted potatoes
MANOURI ROLLO
rolled vegetarian pasta, sautéed spinach, manouri cheese, tomato sauce
MOUSSAKA
Maple leaf farms Pekin duck baked casserole layered with eggplant, potato, bechamel
BRAISED WAGYU
Allen Bros. short rib, onions, garlic, mushrooms, tomato, herbs, pommes purée
YOUVETSI
Allen Bros., all-natural “volcano” lamb shank, orzo, wild rice, roasted tomato, myzithra
Dio Deka - Fine Hellenic Cuisine
Chops & Steaks
“The only time to eat diet food is while you are waiting for a steak to cook” Julia Child - American Chef, Author
DOUBLE RIB LAMB CHOPS
Australian pasture raised, distinct richness with a sweet, grassy flavor profile
PETITE CUT two chops from four ribs
CLASSIC CUT three chops from six ribs
HERITAGE DUROC PORK CHOP
16 oz. All-natural, thick cut from rib of loin, high level of marbling
Partnered with Chicago’s Allen Bros. a premier purveyor of fine beef since 1893, we exclusively feature their finest hand-cut selections of
steaks and chops. All of our beef is corn-fed, rated USDA Prime and solely sourced from Midwestern Native Beef farms in Nebraska, Iowa,
Kansas and Colorado. To achieve a tender, flavorful meat our steaks have been “wet-aged” under highly controlled conditions for 32-48 days.
Only 2% of all beef produced has been allocated to be certified as USDA Prime.
DRY-AGED USDA PRIME MIDWEST BEEF
Dry-aged a minimum of 30 days under highly controlled conditions allows natural enzymes to tenderize the meat, deepens the beef’s
nuanced flavor while imparting a rich taste with a sweet nuttiness reminiscent of roasted peanuts. The longer aging time increases
moisture evaporation creating a texture with a bit more bite than what you would expect from a wet-aged steak, we also
recommend cooking to a rare or medium-rare to maintain the delicate flavor profile.
BISTECCA ALLA FIORENTINA
SARATOGA BONELESS RIBEYE
AMBASSADOR
16 oz. BONELESS STRIP LOIN, 60 DAY DRY-AGED
WET-AGED USDA PRIME MIDWEST BEEF
Hand-cut for fine texture and rich marbling, “wet-aged” for 32-48 days to achieve an incredibly robust flavor and juicy tenderness.
“BASEBALL CUT” FILET MIGNON
“NEW YORK” STRIP LOIN
“DELMONICO” BONE-IN RIBEYE
“T-BONE” PORTERHOUSE
CENTER CUT BONE-IN FILET MIGNON
“KANSAS CITY” BONE-IN STRIP LOIN
“COWBOY” BONE-IN RIBEYE
“TOMAHAWK” LONG-BONE RIBEYE
All steaks and chops are served à la carte and may be subject to a limited availability.
Larger steak cuts may be presented sliced while highly recommended not be ordered past a medium temperature.
Dio Deka - Fine Hellenic Cuisine

Dampens color and removes blinks
This mode enables people with epilepsy to use the website safely by eliminating the risk of seizures that result from flashing or blinking animations and risky color combinations.
Visually Impaired Mode

Improves website's visuals
This mode adjusts the website for the convenience of users with visual impairments such as Degrading Eyesight, Tunnel Vision, Cataract, Glaucoma, and others.
Cognitive Disability Mode

Helps to focus on specific content
This mode provides different assistive options to help users with cognitive impairments such as Dyslexia, Autism, CVA, and others, to focus on the essential elements of the website more easily.

This mode helps users with ADHD and Neurodevelopmental disorders to read, browse, and focus on the main website elements more easily while significantly reducing distractions.

This mode configures the website to be compatible with screen-readers such as JAWS, NVDA, VoiceOver, and TalkBack. A screen-reader is software for blind users that is installed on a computer and smartphone, and websites must be compatible with it.

Dio Deka
Accessibility Statement
Accessibility Statement
diodeka.com
September 29, 2025
Compliance status
We firmly believe that the internet should be available and accessible to anyone, and are committed to providing a website that is accessible to the widest possible audience,
regardless of circumstance and ability.
To fulfill this, we aim to adhere as strictly as possible to the World Wide Web Consortium’s (W3C) Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.1 (WCAG 2.1) at the AA level.
These guidelines explain how to make web content accessible to people with a wide array of disabilities. Complying with those guidelines helps us ensure that the website is accessible
to all people: blind people, people with motor impairments, visual impairment, cognitive disabilities, and more.
This website utilizes various technologies that are meant to make it as accessible as possible at all times. We utilize an accessibility interface that allows persons with specific
disabilities to adjust the website’s UI (user interface) and design it to their personal needs.
Additionally, the website utilizes an AI-based application that runs in the background and optimizes its accessibility level constantly. This application remediates the website’s HTML,
adapts Its functionality and behavior for screen-readers used by the blind users, and for keyboard functions used by individuals with motor impairments.
If you’ve found a malfunction or have ideas for improvement, we’ll be happy to hear from you. You can reach out to the website’s operators by using the following email
Screen-reader and keyboard navigation
Our website implements the ARIA attributes (Accessible Rich Internet Applications) technique, alongside various different behavioral changes, to ensure blind users visiting with
screen-readers are able to read, comprehend, and enjoy the website’s functions. As soon as a user with a screen-reader enters your site, they immediately receive
a prompt to enter the Screen-Reader Profile so they can browse and operate your site effectively. Here’s how our website covers some of the most important screen-reader requirements,
alongside console screenshots of code examples:
Screen-reader optimization:
we run a background process that learns the website’s components from top to bottom, to ensure ongoing compliance even when updating the website.
	In this process, we provide screen-readers with meaningful data using the ARIA set of attributes. For example, we provide accurate form labels;
	descriptions for actionable icons (social media icons, search icons, cart icons, etc.); validation guidance for form inputs; element roles such as buttons, menus, modal dialogues (popups),
	and others. Additionally, the background process scans all the website’s images and provides an accurate and meaningful image-object-recognition-based description as an ALT (alternate text) tag
	for images that are not described. It will also extract texts that are embedded within the image, using an OCR (optical character recognition) technology.
	To turn on screen-reader adjustments at any time, users need only to press the Alt+1 keyboard combination. Screen-reader users also get automatic announcements to turn the Screen-reader mode on
	as soon as they enter the website.
These adjustments are compatible with all popular screen readers, including JAWS and NVDA.
Keyboard navigation optimization:
The background process also adjusts the website’s HTML, and adds various behaviors using JavaScript code to make the website operable by the keyboard. This includes the ability to navigate the website using the Tab and Shift+Tab keys, operate dropdowns with the arrow keys, close them with Esc, trigger buttons and links using the Enter key, navigate between radio and checkbox elements using the arrow keys, and fill them in with the Spacebar or Enter key.Additionally, keyboard users will find quick-navigation and content-skip menus, available at any time by clicking Alt+1, or as the first elements of the site while navigating with the keyboard. The background process also handles triggered popups by moving the keyboard focus towards them as soon as they appear, and not allow the focus drift outside it.
Users can also use shortcuts such as “M” (menus), “H” (headings), “F” (forms), “B” (buttons), and “G” (graphics) to jump to specific elements.
Disability profiles supported in our website
Epilepsy Safe Mode:
this profile enables people with epilepsy to use the website safely by eliminating the risk of seizures that result from flashing or blinking animations and risky color combinations.
Visually Impaired Mode:
this mode adjusts the website for the convenience of users with visual impairments such as Degrading Eyesight, Tunnel Vision, Cataract, Glaucoma, and others.
Cognitive Disability Mode:
this mode provides different assistive options to help users with cognitive impairments such as Dyslexia, Autism, CVA, and others, to focus on the essential elements of the website more easily.
ADHD Friendly Mode:
this mode helps users with ADHD and Neurodevelopmental disorders to read, browse, and focus on the main website elements more easily while significantly reducing distractions.
Blindness Mode:
this mode configures the website to be compatible with screen-readers such as JAWS, NVDA, VoiceOver, and TalkBack. A screen-reader is software for blind users that is installed on a  computer and smartphone, and websites must be compatible with it.
Keyboard Navigation Profile (Motor-Impaired):
this profile enables motor-impaired persons to operate the website using the keyboard Tab, Shift+Tab, and the Enter keys. Users can also use shortcuts such as “M” (menus), “H” (headings), “F” (forms), “B” (buttons), and “G” (graphics) to jump to specific elements.
Additional UI, design, and readability adjustments
Font adjustments –
users, can increase and decrease its size, change its family (type), adjust the spacing, alignment, line height, and more.
Color adjustments –
users can select various color contrast profiles such as light, dark, inverted, and monochrome. Additionally, users can swap color schemes of titles, texts, and backgrounds, with over seven different coloring options.
Animations –
person with epilepsy can stop all running animations with the click of a button. Animations controlled by the interface include videos, GIFs, and CSS flashing transitions.
Content highlighting –
users can choose to emphasize important elements such as links and titles. They can also choose to highlight focused or hovered elements only.
Audio muting –
users with hearing devices may experience headaches or other issues due to automatic audio playing. This option lets users mute the entire website instantly.
Cognitive disorders –
we utilize a search engine that is linked to Wikipedia and Wiktionary, allowing people with cognitive disorders to decipher meanings of phrases, initials, slang, and others.
Additional functions –
we provide users the option to change cursor color and size, use a printing mode, enable a virtual keyboard, and many other functions.
Browser and assistive technology compatibility
We aim to support the widest array of browsers and assistive technologies as possible, so our users can choose the best fitting tools for them, with as few limitations as possible. Therefore, we have worked very hard to be able to support all major systems that comprise over 95% of the user market share including Google Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Apple Safari, Opera and Microsoft Edge, JAWS and NVDA (screen readers).
Notes, comments, and feedback
Despite our very best efforts to allow anybody to adjust the website to their needs. There may still be pages or sections that are not fully accessible, are in the process of becoming accessible, or are lacking an adequate technological solution to make them accessible. Still, we are continually improving our accessibility, adding, updating and improving its options and features, and developing and adopting new technologies. All this is meant to reach the optimal level of accessibility, following technological advancements. For any assistance, please reach out to
For full functionality of this site it is necessary to enable JavaScript.

The Menu
We have created a menu of dishes using the finest seasonal produce and beloved traditional Mediterannean recipes. These dishes are prepared on site every day, and paired with ingredients so good they really speak for themselves.
