Review by - Google
Nandu R:
Wonderful nice restaurant! Surprisingly good ambience for a mostly take out place. Huge portions and awesome quality of food. Lentil soup, fries and falafel wrap were great...
Review by - Google
Kai S:
The food was delicious! I had a lamb gyro plate, and my wife had the lamb souvlaki. We also had a large tzatziki (comes with 2 pitas). Everything was amazing! They serve the pitas warm with herbs...
Review by - Google
Adreon:
Got the Lamb and Beef Gyro, PHENOMENAL!! it was literally ready within minutes of ordering. I will definitely be back to try one of everything on the menu. Congratulations on the new location!
Review by - Google
Joy A:
Delicious food authentic,fresh ingredients very tasty I really enjoyed it. It had that homemade taste I had the Greek salad with the grilled chicken skewers...
Review by - Google
Fast G:
Wow! Seriously good food. My new favorite spot for sure.  Just around the corner from the house I finally tried it out today and was mad I waiting so long lol . I ordered the lamb Gyro and the Falafel...

About the Business
Nick the Greek was born after one of three close-knit cousins, Nick (Baby Nick), traveled home from a trip to Greece and realized that there was nowhere near home where he could get quality gyros. As second-generation restaurateurs, Nick and his two cousins, also named Nick (Big Nick and Little Nick) decided to start their own modern restaurant concept. The Nick the Greek concept was born. It has grown to become an incredibly popular, multi-unit chain and a restaurant franchise opportunity primed for even more growth!

About the Business
Petiscos is a casual restaurant by Michelin-star Adega in San Jose. Petiscos and tapas, both have their roots in the Iberian Peninsula. Tapas are better-known in Spain and petiscos in Portugal. They are smaller, sharable plates of traditional dishes.  

By offering smaller versions of these dishes we encourage you to order and taste several of them.  

Petiscos are best enjoyed when shared!
…
Read more

Q:
Is there currently outdoor tables?
A:
There were not when I was there
Mario B.
1 person found this helpful
See 2 more answers
Q:
Is it easy to find parking near the restaurant?
A:
Prepare to park 2-3 blocks away. However, street parking availability depends on time of day. It's harder to find parking in the evenings/at night. I prefer ride share transportation (Lyft, Uber) if I go downtown in the evening.
Giovanna O.

Menu
At The GOOD Salad we’re all about making GOOD food, for GOOD people so that they can feel GOOD. But we didn’t stop there, we made it taste GOOD too. Think Healthy Salads = Bland? Not here. We’ve crafted a menu of the best signature salads, but you always have the flexibility to customize them or design your own from scratch so you get exactly what you want
Nutrition
Blazing Bird
$15
Cajun chicken thigh (halal) over crisp romaine with zesty black bean & corn pico de gallo, crispy onions, and hand scooped avocado. Served with our homemade chipotle ranch and signature Good Glaze on the side.
Mediterranean Medley
$14
Crisp romaine with juicy tomatoes, Persian cucumbers, radish, green onions, and fresh parsley, finished with tangy sumac, feta, and house baked whole-wheat pita. Served with our house grape vinaigrette and signature Good Glaze on the side.
Steak Supreme
$16
Grass-fed flank steak (halal) over crisp romaine with smoky bacon, tangy blue cheese, homemade pickled red onion, dried cranberries, and fresh green onions. Served with our homemade buttermilk ranch and signature Good Glaze on the side.
Samurai Steak
$16
Grass-fed flank steak (halal) topped with dynamite mayo and toasted sesame, over a mix of spring mix, romaine, cucumbers, carrots, edamame, and green onions, with roasted peanuts for crunch. Served with our sweet sesame dressing and signature Good Glaze on the side.
Cali Caesar
$15
Herby chicken breast (halal) over crisp romaine with hand scooped avocado, parmesan shavings, and house-toasted almonds for crunch. Served with our pesto Caesar dressing and signature Good Glaze on the side.
Date Delight
$15
Tender spring mix and arugula topped with sweet Medjool dates, corn, avocado, and feta. Finished with crisp radish, green onions, and sunflower seed crunch. Served with our homemade chipotle honey vinaigrette dressing and signature Good Glaze on the side.
Ruby Roots
$14
Crisp purple cabbage and romaine with white quinoa, toasted pumpkin seeds, carrots, fresh beets, dried cranberries, and house baked whole-wheat pita, served with our black seed lemon vinaigrette and signature Good Glaze on the side.

Pesto Caesar
The very first dressing we ever created. A creamy Caesar with a fresh pesto twist. Simple, herby, and unforgettable.
Classic Buttermilk Ranch
Rich and dill-heavy classic ranch. If you're a ranch person, you will love this one.
Chipotle Honey Vinaigrette
Honey, vinegar and chipotle join forces to deliver one hell of a punchy dressing. This side experiment quickly forced its way into the lineup.
Chipotle Ranch
Our Classic Ranch blended with smoky chipotle peppers, iconic duo.
Grape Vinaigrette
Explosive classic vinaigrette mixed with grapes.
Sweet Sesame
Flavors from the east. Many people get hooked on this one and refuse to try anything else.
Fat Free Herby Yogurt
Yogurt based with a ton of herbs. Guilt free dressing right here - only 29 calories per cup!
Lemon Vinaigrette
Bright, citrusy, and a little nutty. The lemon keeps it fresh while blackseed adds an earthy twist.
The Good Glaze
Our signature pomegranate infused balsamic reduction. Sweet and tangy drizzle that ties all the flavors together. Caution: may cause addiction.
Homemade Dressings
Homemade Guac and Chips
House-made guacamole from a recipe brought to us by employee #4, straight from his hometown. Served with crispy tortilla chips.
$5
Homemade Focaccia
Baked fresh every morning at 5am in small batches. Soft, golden, and gone when it’s gone.
$2
The Good Chocolate
Award Winning Sugar Free Chocolate from our friends at The Good Chocolate.
$2
Energy Bites
Nutty, sweet and satisfying. These pistachio bites are packed with flavor and just the right amount of crunch. Perfect for a quick, feel good snack.
$5
Moms Lentil Soup
Just like mom makes it. Silky, smooth lentils simmered in a rich chicken bone broth. Add your favorite toppings to take it to the next level.
$4
Homemade Bone Broth
Made from scratch and simmered low and slow. A rich chicken bone broth packed with collagen, nutrients, and flavor.
$4
Sides and Sweets
Homemade Yuzu Ice Tea
House-brewed white tea blended with yuzu, pineapple, and a touch of agave for a crisp, refreshing sip.
Homemade Wild Watermelon Juice
Sweet watermelon, zesty lime, and fresh basil with a tangy hit of pomegranate molasses. Summer in a glass but wilder.

name: Falafel's Drive-In
address: 2301 Stevens Creek Blvd, San Jose, CA 95128
raw_text:
Falafel's Drive In MENU (update September 2025)
Skip to content
Falafel's Drive In
Home
Menu
services
delivery
photos
Menu of Falafel’s Drive In
The menu was updated in October 2024.
For more information, please contact phone number:
+1 408-294-7886
A Memorable Dining Experience
The dining experience at Falafel’s Drive In is renowned for its delightful array of Middle-Eastern dishes, which are savored by many. Patrons are welcomed into a casual and historic setting where iconic foods are served. The falafels, which are freshly made and expertly seasoned, are celebrated for the crispiness and rich flavor. Alongside these, the banana milkshake is praised for its creamy texture and unique taste, making it a popular choice among diners. Meals are prepared using traditional recipes that have been passed down through generations.
The gyros are enjoyed for the tender meat and well-balanced spices, while the kabab offers a smoky and flavorful bite. Pita chips and onion rings are provided as satisfying sides, complementing the main dishes perfectly. The inclusion of fresh salads and tabbouleh ensures that a variety of tastes and preferences are accommodated. Outdoor seating is offered to enhance the dining experience, allowing guests to enjoy the meals in a relaxed atmosphere. Service is noted for its efficiency, ensuring that meals are served promptly, whether for a quick lunch or a leisurely dinner. The ambiance, characterized by its historic charm and unpretentious style, contributes to the overall enjoyment of the meal.
Falafel’s Drive In’s Quality Ingredients
Falafel’s Drive In, exceptional emphasis is placed on the quality of ingredients, which plays a crucial role in defining the renowned taste of the dishes offered. The falafels are crafted from meticulously selected chickpeas, which are ground and blended with a blend of spices to achieve the perfect consistency. This dedication to using fresh, high-quality components ensures that each falafel boasts a crispy, golden exterior while maintaining a tender and flavorful interior. The process of making these falafels involves careful attention to detail, ensuring that every bite delivers a satisfying crunch and a burst of well-balanced flavors. The pita chips served alongside the falafels are also made with precision. Freshly baked pita bread is used, which is then seasoned and toasted to achieve a delightful crunch. The pita chips are designed to complement the falafels and provide an additional layer of texture and taste to the meal. the crispiness and seasoning enhance the overall dining experience, offering a perfect pairing with the falafel.
Salads and tabbouleh, integral parts of the menu, are made with the freshest vegetables and herbs. The use of high-quality produce adds a burst of flavor and a nutritious component to the meal. The freshness of the ingredients is evident in the vibrant colors and crisp textures of the salads, which are prepared with a focus on maintaining the natural flavors of the vegetables and herbs. The banana milkshake, a popular choice among patrons, is made with ripe bananas and creamy milk. This combination ensures a smooth, indulgent treat that complements the savory dishes perfectly. The banana milkshake’s rich, creamy texture and sweet flavor make it a favorite addition to any meal, highlighting the commitment to quality ingredients in every aspect of the menu. Each dish served reflects a commitment to maintaining high standards, ensuring that every aspect of the meal, from the falafels to the milkshakes, meets the expectations of quality and taste that patrons have come to appreciate.
Experience the Menu
The menu at Falafel’s Drive In is designed to offer a diverse selection of Middle-Eastern dishes that cater to various tastes. Falafels are prominently featured, renowned for the crispy texture and rich flavor, which are achieved through a carefully crafted recipe. This dish is a highlight of the menu and is frequently praised by patrons. Additionally, the gyros and kabab are celebrated for the tender, flavorful meat and expertly balanced seasoning. The pita chips and onion rings are offered as popular sides, providing additional options for those seeking a variety of tastes. Fresh salads and tabbouleh are included, adding a healthy and refreshing element to the meal. The banana milkshake stands out as a unique and delightful choice, offering a creamy and indulgent treat that complements the savory dishes perfectly. Each item on the menu is prepared with care, ensuring that high standards are maintained across the board. The combination of traditional flavors and quality ingredients creates a satisfying dining experience that is appreciated by many.

Nandu R:
Wonderful nice restaurant! Surprisingly good ambience for a mostly take out place. Huge portions and awesome quality of food. Lentil soup, fries and falafel wrap were great...
Review by - Google
Kai S:
The food was delicious! I had a lamb gyro plate, and my wife had the lamb souvlaki. We also had a large tzatziki (comes with 2 pitas). Everything was amazing! They serve the pitas warm with herbs...
Review by - Google
Adreon:
Got the Lamb and Beef Gyro, PHENOMENAL!! it was literally ready within minutes of ordering. I will definitely be back to try one of everything on the menu. Congratulations on the new location!
Review by - Google

Delicious food authentic,fresh ingredients very tasty I really enjoyed it. It had that homemade taste I had the Greek salad with the grilled chicken skewers...
Review by - Google

Wow! Seriously good food. My new favorite spot for sure.  Just around the corner from the house I finally tried it out today and was mad I waiting so long lol . I ordered the lamb Gyro and the Falafel...

Menus
Summer Cocktail Menu
Lunch Menu
Happy Hour Menu
Dinner Menu
Wine List
Family Style Take Out
Summer Cocktail Menu
12
Strawberry Basil Mule (Morgan Hill)
A vibrant twist on the classic mule—Tito’s Handmade Vodka shaken with ripe strawberry purée, muddled fresh basil, and zesty lemon-lime juice, then topped with crisp ginger beer. Served over ice for a refreshing burst of summer in every sip.
15
Aperol Sprits
Prosecco brut, with Aperol Liqueur and a splash of soda water. Topped with orange sliced.
12
Mango Margarita (Morgan Hill)
A tropical escape in a glass—Don Julio Blanco Tequila expertly blended with orange liqueur, freshly squeezed lime juice, and luscious mango purée. Served on the rocks with a salted rim and a zesty lime wedge for the perfect balance of sweet, tangy, and smooth.
13
Kiwi Mule
Absolut vodka combined with lime juice and fresh kiwi puree. Splashed with ginger beer, then served with a lime wedge.
12
Tropical Cosmo (Morgan Hill)
A vibrant island twist on a classic—Bacardi rum shaken with exotic passion fruit and blood orange liqueur, then splashed with refreshing pineapple and cranberry juices. Bright, bold, and beautifully balanced, it’s a getaway in every sip.
13
Cucumber Martini
Tito’s vodka, mixed with lime juice, simple syrup, fresh cucumbers, and garnished with a lime.
13
Hibiscus Old Fashioned (Morgan Hill)
A graceful take on a classic—Buffalo Trace bourbon gently stirred with chocolate bitters and a touch of hibiscus syrup. This beautifully balanced cocktail offers rich depth, subtle floral sweetness, and a smooth, lingering finish. A sophisticated sip to savor.
13
Kiwi Margarita
Our house tequila, combined with an orange liqueur, freshly squeezed lime juice, fresh Kiwi puree, Sweet and Sour mix. It is served with a lime wedge and salted rim.
13
Empress Cosmo
Empress gin mixed with orange liqueur, cranberry, and lime juice.
16
Blueberry Pineapple Tequila Sour (Gilroy)
A tropical twist on a classic sour, made with Don Julio Silver, muddled blueberries, pineapple purée, and zesty lime juice.

Happy Hour Menu
Mon – Fri:
3pm – 7pm   &
Sat – Sun:
12pm -5pm
Happy Hour is not available on Holidays
9
Grilled Mahi Mahi Fish Tacos
Fresh, flavorful, and full of coastal charm—our grilled Mahi Mahi tacos are topped with crisp purple cabbage, fresh pico de gallo, and finished with a roasted red bell pepper aioli that adds the perfect smoky kick. Served on warm corn tortillas for a light yet satisfying bite.
8
Nachos Grande
Homemade tortilla chips piled high with creamy nacho cheese, fresh pico de gallo, and a dollop of sour cream. It’s the ultimate happy hour indulgence—perfect for sharing or savoring all to yourself.
6
Crispy Fried Onion Rings
Golden, crunchy, and full of flavor—our thick-cut onion rings are fried to perfection and served with a zesty chipotle ranch dipping sauce. A crowd favorite with just the right amount of spice!
5

Menu
At The GOOD Salad we’re all about making GOOD food, for GOOD people so that they can feel GOOD. But we didn’t stop there, we made it taste GOOD too. Think Healthy Salads = Bland? Not here. We’ve crafted a menu of the best signature salads, but you always have the flexibility to customize them or design your own from scratch so you get exactly what you want
Nutrition
Blazing Bird
$15
Cajun chicken thigh (halal) over crisp romaine with zesty black bean & corn pico de gallo, crispy onions, and hand scooped avocado. Served with our homemade chipotle ranch and signature Good Glaze on the side.
Mediterranean Medley
$14
Crisp romaine with juicy tomatoes, Persian cucumbers, radish, green onions, and fresh parsley, finished with tangy sumac, feta, and house baked whole-wheat pita. Served with our house grape vinaigrette and signature Good Glaze on the side.
Steak Supreme
$16
Grass-fed flank steak (halal) over crisp romaine with smoky bacon, tangy blue cheese, homemade pickled red onion, dried cranberries, and fresh green onions. Served with our homemade buttermilk ranch and signature Good Glaze on the side.
Samurai Steak
$16
Grass-fed flank steak (halal) topped with dynamite mayo and toasted sesame, over a mix of spring mix, romaine, cucumbers, carrots, edamame, and green onions, with roasted peanuts for crunch. Served with our sweet sesame dressing and signature Good Glaze on the side.
Cali Caesar
$15
Herby chicken breast (halal) over crisp romaine with hand scooped avocado, parmesan shavings, and house-toasted almonds for crunch. Served with our pesto Caesar dressing and signature Good Glaze on the side.
Date Delight
$15
Tender spring mix and arugula topped with sweet Medjool dates, corn, avocado, and feta. Finished with crisp radish, green onions, and sunflower seed crunch. Served with our homemade chipotle honey vinaigrette dressing and signature Good Glaze on the side.
Ruby Roots
$14
Crisp purple cabbage and romaine with white quinoa, toasted pumpkin seeds, carrots, fresh beets, dried cranberries, and house baked whole-wheat pita, served with our black seed lemon vinaigrette and signature Good Glaze on the side.
Signature Salads

Pesto Caesar
The very first dressing we ever created. A creamy Caesar with a fresh pesto twist. Simple, herby, and unforgettable.
Classic Buttermilk Ranch
Rich and dill-heavy classic ranch. If you're a ranch person, you will love this one.
Chipotle Honey Vinaigrette
Honey, vinegar and chipotle join forces to deliver one hell of a punchy dressing. This side experiment quickly forced its way into the lineup.
Chipotle Ranch
Our Classic Ranch blended with smoky chipotle peppers, iconic duo.
Grape Vinaigrette
Explosive classic vinaigrette mixed with grapes.
Sweet Sesame
Flavors from the east. Many people get hooked on this one and refuse to try anything else.
Fat Free Herby Yogurt
Yogurt based with a ton of herbs. Guilt free dressing right here - only 29 calories per cup!
Lemon Vinaigrette
Bright, citrusy, and a little nutty. The lemon keeps it fresh while blackseed adds an earthy twist.
The Good Glaze
Our signature pomegranate infused balsamic reduction. Sweet and tangy drizzle that ties all the flavors together. Caution: may cause addiction.
Homemade Dressings
Homemade Guac and Chips
House-made guacamole from a recipe brought to us by employee #4, straight from his hometown. Served with crispy tortilla chips.
$5
Homemade Focaccia
Baked fresh every morning at 5am in small batches. Soft, golden, and gone when it’s gone.
$2
The Good Chocolate
Award Winning Sugar Free Chocolate from our friends at The Good Chocolate.
$2
Energy Bites
Nutty, sweet and satisfying. These pistachio bites are packed with flavor and just the right amount of crunch. Perfect for a quick, feel good snack.
$5
Moms Lentil Soup
Just like mom makes it. Silky, smooth lentils simmered in a rich chicken bone broth. Add your favorite toppings to take it to the next level.
$4
Homemade Bone Broth
Made from scratch and simmered low and slow. A rich chicken bone broth packed with collagen, nutrients, and flavor.
$4
Sides and Sweets
Homemade Yuzu Ice Tea
House-brewed white tea blended with yuzu, pineapple, and a touch of agave for a crisp, refreshing sip.
Homemade Wild Watermelon Juice
Sweet watermelon, zesty lime, and fresh basil with a tangy hit of pomegranate molasses. Summer in a glass but wilder.

About the Business
Selam Restaurant and Cafe, locally owned and operated family business, has been serving the Bay Area authentic Ethiopian food, made with fresh ingredients, unique traditional spices, non GMO ingredients, and made to order, for more than 10 years.

With plenty of parking you can dine in or order carry out. Selam Restaurant and Cafe is priced competitively. With a large menu of dining options it will quickly become one of your favorite restaurants if you love Ethiopian cuisine.

Selam Restaurant and Cafe can host your large private or corporate party. For more information about reserving space for events of 40 people or more, call or fill out the contact form, or stop by the restaurant.

You may purchase beer or wine to enjoy with your meal. Enjoy the unique atmosphere, relaxed service and great food. Credit cards accepted. Make your reservation today!

Our Menu

Home
About Us
Our Menu
Contact Us
Our Menu
Falafel Sandwich
Freshly made chickpea balls, lettuce, tomato and parsley/mint, topped with tahini sauce (sesame dressing) and wrapped in an organic, whole wheat pita (vegan).
Gyro Sandwich
Your choice of beef/lamb or chicken; topped with onions, lettuce, tomato and tzatziki sauce (yogurt-based dressing), wrapped in whole wheat flat bread
Mana Bread
Záatar (thyme herb blend and sesame), olive oil, fresh mint, kalamata olives, and tomato served on grilled, whole wheat flat bread
Falafel Salad
Four freshly made chickpea balls sit atop fresh romaine lettuce, tomatoes and parsley/mint, served with tahini dressing
Red Lentil Soup
Our family recipe; red lentils, vermicelli noodles, onions, garlic, fresh herbs, and our house-made seasoning blend
Esau’s Porridge
Our family recipe; brown lentils, onions, and our house-made seasoning blend
Mediterranean Salads
Fava Bean Salad, Cabbage Salad, Potato Salad, and low-fat Yogurt Cucumber Salad. All of our salads are mayonnaise and butter free.
Dolmas
Rice and herb stuffed grape leaves
Baklava
Handmade puff-pastry filled with our special mixture of nuts and spices

About the Business
Our food is made with care and love! And it is 100% hand slaughtered zabhiha halal meat! We have been doing butchering for the past 45 years! First in Kabul, and then in California! Our food comes with free GMOs and 100% grass fed. No other hormones are in it!
…
Read more

Q:
Is there no buffet on weekends?
A:
Yes! We have buffet on the weekends now ONLY: Friday, Saturday & Sunday from 12:00pm to 4:00pm. Prices:
Adults (ages 11 & up): $25.99 +tax
Children (ages 2-10): $14.99+tax

raw_text:
Salad Menu | Salad Restaurant | The Good Salad in Santa Clara, Los Altos and Palo Alto

Order Online
Menu
At The GOOD Salad we’re all about making GOOD food, for GOOD people so that they can feel GOOD. But we didn’t stop there, we made it taste GOOD too. Think Healthy Salads = Bland? Not here. We’ve crafted a menu of the best signature salads, but you always have the flexibility to customize them or design your own from scratch so you get exactly what you want
Nutrition
Blazing Bird
$15
Cajun chicken thigh (halal) over crisp romaine with zesty black bean & corn pico de gallo, crispy onions, and hand scooped avocado. Served with our homemade chipotle ranch and signature Good Glaze on the side.
Mediterranean Medley
$14
Crisp romaine with juicy tomatoes, Persian cucumbers, radish, green onions, and fresh parsley, finished with tangy sumac, feta, and house baked whole-wheat pita. Served with our house grape vinaigrette and signature Good Glaze on the side.
Steak Supreme
$16
Grass-fed flank steak (halal) over crisp romaine with smoky bacon, tangy blue cheese, homemade pickled red onion, dried cranberries, and fresh green onions. Served with our homemade buttermilk ranch and signature Good Glaze on the side.
Samurai Steak
$16
Grass-fed flank steak (halal) topped with dynamite mayo and toasted sesame, over a mix of spring mix, romaine, cucumbers, carrots, edamame, and green onions, with roasted peanuts for crunch. Served with our sweet sesame dressing and signature Good Glaze on the side.
Cali Caesar
$15
Herby chicken breast (halal) over crisp romaine with hand scooped avocado, parmesan shavings, and house-toasted almonds for crunch. Served with our pesto Caesar dressing and signature Good Glaze on the side.
Date Delight
$15
Tender spring mix and arugula topped with sweet Medjool dates, corn, avocado, and feta. Finished with crisp radish, green onions, and sunflower seed crunch. Served with our homemade chipotle honey vinaigrette dressing and signature Good Glaze on the side.
Ruby Roots
$14
Crisp purple cabbage and romaine with white quinoa, toasted pumpkin seeds, carrots, fresh beets, dried cranberries, and house baked whole-wheat pita, served with our black seed lemon vinaigrette and signature Good Glaze on the side.
Signature Salads

Crushed Red Pepper Flakes
Pesto Caesar
The very first dressing we ever created. A creamy Caesar with a fresh pesto twist. Simple, herby, and unforgettable.
Classic Buttermilk Ranch
Rich and dill-heavy classic ranch. If you're a ranch person, you will love this one.
Chipotle Honey Vinaigrette
Honey, vinegar and chipotle join forces to deliver one hell of a punchy dressing. This side experiment quickly forced its way into the lineup.
Chipotle Ranch
Our Classic Ranch blended with smoky chipotle peppers, iconic duo.
Grape Vinaigrette
Explosive classic vinaigrette mixed with grapes.
Sweet Sesame
Flavors from the east. Many people get hooked on this one and refuse to try anything else.
Fat Free Herby Yogurt
Yogurt based with a ton of herbs. Guilt free dressing right here - only 29 calories per cup!
Lemon Vinaigrette
Bright, citrusy, and a little nutty. The lemon keeps it fresh while blackseed adds an earthy twist.
The Good Glaze
Our signature pomegranate infused balsamic reduction. Sweet and tangy drizzle that ties all the flavors together. Caution: may cause addiction.
Homemade Dressings
Homemade Guac and Chips
House-made guacamole from a recipe brought to us by employee #4, straight from his hometown. Served with crispy tortilla chips.
$5
Homemade Focaccia
Baked fresh every morning at 5am in small batches. Soft, golden, and gone when it’s gone.
$2
The Good Chocolate
Award Winning Sugar Free Chocolate from our friends at The Good Chocolate.
$2
Energy Bites
Nutty, sweet and satisfying. These pistachio bites are packed with flavor and just the right amount of crunch. Perfect for a quick, feel good snack.
$5
Moms Lentil Soup
Just like mom makes it. Silky, smooth lentils simmered in a rich chicken bone broth. Add your favorite toppings to take it to the next level.
$4
Homemade Bone Broth
Made from scratch and simmered low and slow. A rich chicken bone broth packed with collagen, nutrients, and flavor.
$4
Sides and Sweets
Homemade Yuzu Ice Tea
House-brewed white tea blended with yuzu, pineapple, and a touch of agave for a crisp, refreshing sip.
Homemade Wild Watermelon Juice
Sweet watermelon, zesty lime, and fresh basil with a tangy hit of pomegranate molasses. Summer in a glass but wilder.

raw_text:
Wylder Space | Santa Cruz Wedding & Event Catering (Farm-to-Table, Stress-Free)

Curated Menus
The Essential Canning Cookbook
Wylder Shop
Community
Mentorship
Canning & Food Preservation Community
Canning & Food Preservation Blog
Member Login
Your Wedding Day Shouldn't Feel Like Work | Farm-to-Table Catering Santa Cruz
This is
your
moment. You deserve to feel cherished—not frazzled. My team and I handle every detail so you can breathe, be present, and actually enjoy the day you’ve dreamed of.
Make my dream effortless
Wylder Space - Farm-to-Table Catering & Community
I See You. I've Got You.
Hi, I'm Molly.
I know how this feels:
The weight of wanting everything perfect
The fear that one detail might slip
The exhaustion from trying to do it all for everyone
You don’t need to carry that alone.
When you trust us with your wedding, you get
:
Someone who will
lose sleep over your happiness
(so you don’t have to)
Someone who guards your peace like it’s sacred
Someone who knows this isn’t “just an event”—it’s your forever beginning
What makes Wylder Space different:
🌿 Seasonal, local ingredients from the farms I trust and love
💛 Every dietary need handled with genuine care
🤝 Service that feels like family—not “vendors”
About Wylder Space | Santa Cruz Catering
We Hold Your Dreams
💕
Wedding Catering
Your once-in-a-lifetime day deserves magic. We’ll sweat the details so you can focus on marrying your best friend. Farm-to-table menus, crafted with love.
🌿
Intimate Celebrations
Engagement dinners. Rehearsal nights. Family gatherings where strangers leave as kin. Spaces where love gets to breathe.
🏔️
Corporate Events

About the Business
Pana Venezuelan Food in downtown Santa Cruz brings the bold, comforting flavors of Venezuela to the heart of California. Founded by German and Gabriela, Pana specializes in authentic arepas—crispy cornmeal pockets filled with traditional ingredients like shredded beef, chicken with avocado, black beans, cheese, and more. Each arepa is 100% gluten-free and made fresh to order with care and flavor that reflects home-cooked roots. But Pana is more than just arepas. The menu includes tropical juices like papaya and watermelon, savory yuca fries, sweet plantains, and the crowd-favorite dessert: quesillo, a creamy Venezuelan flan. What makes Pana truly unique is the heart behind the food. Every guest is treated like family, and the team works with customers’ needs and budgets, especially for catering and events. Whether you’re grabbing lunch downtown or planning a party, Pana brings real hospitality, bold flavors, and cultural pride to every plate. It's not just a meal—it's a taste of Venezuela.
